des ni mdo sde 'di lamos par 'gyur// gang zhigamig zad ngo bom rtogs pa// des nim gnas tshul khrims bsgrubaminus// mi gnas tshul khrims
mngon par masgrub pa// desanamadosde 'ad lamasam 'gyur// gang zhig mag zad ngo bo rab rtogs pas// des ni mi gnasatshul khrims bsgrubapar nus// mganas tshul khrims
sh+tsa mngon par bsgrub pas na// des ni mdo sde 'di lamos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa// desani zagamed tshul khrims bsgratse minus// zag med tshul khrims
mngon par mi sgrub pas// desanamado sde 'di la mosami'agyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo ba rab rtogs pa// des ni khrag med tshul khrims bsgrub par nus// brag mad tshul khrims
mngon par bsgrub pas na// des na mdosde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa// desan zugamed shes rab bsgrub mi nus// zag med shes rab
mngon par mi sgrub pas// sa rnamado sde 'di lamosam 'gyur// gang zhagamig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// desani zagamed shes rab bsgrub par nus// zag med shes rab mngon par
bsgrub pasan// des ni mdo sde 'di lamos par 'gyur// gang zhigamag zad ngo bo ma rtogs pa// mig stong nyid la rtag tu rmos pa'i 'gyur// des ni kun 'dzin yeshes mi skyid
[s,]pas dmadosdo 'dil rab tu mos mi 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogs pa// mig stong nyid ni rtag par rtogs par 'gyur// desani kun 'dzin ye shes rab skyed pas/ mdo/
sde 'di la rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig zad ngo bo rab rtogasapa/ 'dis ni kun 'dzin yeshesa'ab bsgrub na// bla medam chags ye shes rab bsgrub pas// mdo sde 'di la/
rab tu mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di la mamos pa// mig zad ngo bo nyid la rtagatu rmongs// de ni ting 'dzin rnams las nyams pas na// bla med ye shes thob pashin
tu dka'// gang zhagimado sde 'di la rab mos shing// mig brad ngo bo nyidi namangon rtogs pa// desan ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pas na// bla med ye shes mngon byed dka' ba
mod gang zhig mag zad ngo bo nyid rtogs shing// bdagamed mtshan nyid rab tu shes pas/ 'des ni rtag tu chos 'di thos posan// mngon par yid ches the tshom med pa 'thob
gang zhig mig zad ngo bo nyid sems shing// nyin mtshanarab brtson le lomod pa'ani// des ni kun 'dzin spobs pas mngon bsgrubs nas// mdo sde 'di ni rtag tu ston par 'gyur//
gang zhig mdo sde 'di nisoms byed pa// 'od zer 'byin ba'i ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur// des na de bzhin gshegs pa rabo ston cing// mi stong nyid ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/
gang gisamachod rten brgya stong rab byas ngashing// sangs rgyas thams cad la ni mchod pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni sems byed na// 'di yi yon tan de bas
khyad par 'phags// gang gis rol mo brgya skyong rab byas nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel mchod pa bas// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni thos gyuran// 'di yi yon tan de bas
wA khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs pa'icems can rnams // bskal pa dag ni bye ba tshad med par// de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs par mchod pa bas//
mdo sde 'dibazung bsod nams khyad par 'phags// gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig bzhi pa'/tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin cing ston byed na// de la rgyal ba thugs rje chen
bo yin// gtso ltar gus pa rab tu bskyed par bya// ngan 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong du// srid pa gsum du 'khor bar gyur ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas dag nitshadamad pa rnams la//
mdo sde 'di yi phyir ni rim gro byas// res 'ga' mar me brgya stong tshad med pa// snying po re re'i tshad kyang dpag tshad tsam// sngar nas mdo sde 'di la rab dbang dag/ 'thob par bya
phyir 'drenapa rnams la mchod// res 'ga' tog tsam pa kadang ni// su man dang mya ngan med pa yi// 'phreng ba rgyal mtshan gdugasar sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mchod rten mchod pa byas// nga sngon 'khor bar 'khor bar gyur pa'i tshe// slong du 'ongs pa dag la sbyin btang ste// rjes 'ga'ame tog 'bras bu dag kyang btang// res 'ga' zam pa
khron pa chu mag btang// res 'ga' glang po che dang bzhin pa dang// res 'ga' rin chen rta rang chungam btang// res 'ga' gsar gyi khri dang rani chen gur// res 'ga'asamo dodang
phrad ba btung// de bzhin bskal pa brgyastod rdzogs par ni// mdo sde 'di phyir sems laserasnamed/ (bam po gnyis ba// ngasngon
mdo sde 'di yi phyir// tshul khrims yongasasu dag pa bsrungs// ting 'dzashes rab rtag tu bsgom// sems can rnams lasbyin pa btang// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// gtum
po dgagis rgyad bkag kyang// de tshe nga ni snying brtse bas// de la gnod pa yong ma byas// ngasngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// slong du 'ongs pa dag lani// ji ltar mos bzhin rab btang
bas thams cad rab tu dga' bar byas// da sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// gzhalamed khang chen rnams la ni// rin chen dra bas rab brgyan nas// sangs rgyas rnams la yongs
su phul// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yaphyir// rin chen rnam pasnatshogs dang// yid bzhin nor bu rin po ches// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// drin
yod rnams ni rtag dran bas// than tshig bshadagacig mnyan pa// de la yang ni bkur sti byas// nga sngonamado sde 'di yi phyir// tshul khrims ldan la rab bar
bsathan 'chag pa'i tshe na yang// de la rtag tu gus pa bskyed// nga sngonamadosde 'di yi phyir// 'khor ba dgan 'khor ba'i tshe// drananacung zad yod la yang// de la rtag tu drin du
gzos// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir/ rnyed pam btsal sam skur// te bshesasems can rnams la// snying brtswa dgan rab tu bskyod// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// mdathos
legs bshad ldan pas na// chos lamangon par zhen byed cing// bshesapa'i khyim las snamed// ngasngon mdosde 'di yi phyir// mi dga'i sems ni myos gyur na// myur ba nyid du/
rab bshags pas// 'phel bar yang ni yong ma byas// nga sngonamado sde 'di yi phyir// rgyal po'i buran gyur pa na// rin po che dang byug spos dang// sposakyis phyam ji snyed pa/ dang
ba'asems ngas bskyed nas// sangs rgyas rnams la bsngos shing phul// nga sngonamadosde 'di yi phyir// khri mon btson lasnying brtse bas// sdug bsngalasnatshogs gang myong ba//
lus kyi skyin par dang du blangs// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yaphyir// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs nas// rtag tu dus drug dag gi tshe// sdom pa dag ni rab tu blangs// da sngon mdo sde
'di yi phyir// rtag tu bzod pa rab bsgom pas// tha na chungam dag la yang// 'dod pa'i sar sna yongs ma bskyed// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// dbul 'phongs dag ni thams/
cad kun// bde ba dganathob bya'i phyir// non dgas gis na phyug por byas// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yi phyir// dge slod dang ni bram ze dang// skye dgu rnam pa snatshogs kun// thams
cad dag na rab tubasdus// nga sngon mdo sde 'di yaphyir// thams cad kun la phan gdags phyir// rtag tu sbyin bdag cher byas nas// slong ba dag la yongs su btang// res
'ga'ame tog 'brasabu dgo/ gzhan dag gcod du mi gzhug par// sems can rnams la yongs btang zhing// yid bzhin du ni tshim par byas// ngasngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe// semasan/
rtag dusnyoms pas na// tshul khrims yon tan ldan pa dang// tshul khrims 'chal dang ngo tsha med// rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pas// so so'i skya bo'i bar dag la// ngo mtshar bsam pa'i
sems bskyed nas// gus pas kun la sbyin pa btang// ngasngon sbyin pa btang ba'i tshe// soms lamatho dmaMnayod pasan// sdug bsngal 'gro bam tshol zhing// mdo sde 'di la lcagacig/
mos: rda'os 'ga' yul khams dag tu ni// phyi'i rgol thams cad mod byas shing// klu rnams kun ni rab btul nas// dus bzhin char ni rab tu phab// zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis//
ngas ni tshe rabs dpag med nas// mdo sde 'di ni gnyer ba'i phyir// dka' ba rnams ni rab tu spud// bskal pa brgya stongasnyad du ni// brjod kyang mthar thug
mi 'gyur ro// yid ches pa la khyod gnas nas// ma 'ongs tham dusakyi tshe// yang dag dran pa'i sems bskyed la// mdo sde 'di ni bshad par gyis// ngas ni sangs rgyas spyan
@dag gis// ma 'ongs dus)gsal gzigs pas// spyod pa snatshogasaji ltab// thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa yin// dgeslong dag ni gang zhig gis// bla med ye shes btsal
'khaba'i phyir// shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni// mdo sde 'di nigang ston pa// gang zag de dang phyogs rnamasakyang// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// ma 'ongs tha ma dus kyi/
mdo 'di thos nas gang mos pa// bsam pa dang ni thabs rnams kyang// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dman pa dag ni gang zhig gis// mdo sde 'di ni ma thos pas// chos
bstan pa la skur 'debs pa// thams cad ma lus thugs su chud// dge slong rnams ni gang zhig dang// dgeslong ma nigang zhigagis// mdo sde 'di'i thos gyur nas// shin tu gdung
bas du byed pa// de kun ngas ni lung bstananas// rgyalab gtso bo mthong bar 'gyur// zla 'od khyod kyisashes par gyis// sangs rgyus rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis na// gang dag yid ni reg
pa dang// gang dag gi ni ma dag dang// than mos pa gang yin pa// thams cad m lus thugs su chud// sems can ngagazhigang zhig gis// rab zhi dban la rtagamosashing// ting
'dzin rnams la 'baganas nas// 'khor ba dag la ma chags pas// thon bag chags rnams kyang ni// gnas rab tugad sangs dang// de la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams // thams
cad ma lus thugasasu chud// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// ma bden chos la zhen pa dang// sems can dag ni gang zhig gis// sangs rgyus lanarab mos pa// ma 'ongs dngos
po'i 'di lta bu // thams cad ma lus thugasasu chud// sams can gni gad zhig gis// 'jig rten bde la rab chags pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sa bon dag/ legs panyid du
mi skyid pa// rgyu dang rkyen ni dayaphyir// sbyorab rnams ni nyams par 'gyur// su yang rung bgang zhig gis// byang chubs bon rtogs gyur na// gang zag de yis sa par ni// rnam dag
'od zer dpag med thob// zla 'od khyod kyis 'di lta bu r// 'od zer 'di la sogs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen ni'i re kun// so so tha dad nyid du ltos// khyod kyis shes rab stobs kyis ni//
thams cad de ltar rig par gyis// gang zhigamedage grogs spangs te// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtenanas// tshul khrims rnam dag gang srung ba// sangs rgyas 'ong bur bsgrub pa
'gyur// khyod kyis dbang po rab bsrungs la// ngo tsha khrel med rab tu spongs// dge ba'i chos ni rab bsgoms la// sems can rnams nasrung bar gyis//
khyod kyisartson pa rab spongs la// stong nyid dag ni rtogs par gyis// red pa dag la ma gdu bar// mang thos legs bshad ldan par gyis// khyod kyis rnyed pa dag la// ma/
gtsang lta bu r blta bar gyis// rnyed pa'i dril dag gis ni// rnam dag sems sbagasam byed// rnam par grol ba btsal bar byos// blamang red pa thob par 'gyur//
khyod kyisasangs rgyas lam bsgrubs la// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'dra bar ltos// chos kyi sgron chen rtag sbar la// 'jig rten kun nasnang bar gyis// khyod kyisams na ni
rgyal ltar// mi g.yo nyid du rab tu byas// kha ngan dang ni rdeg payang// thams cad bzod pa dang du long// khyod nisams can rnams kyi phyir// dge bshes yang dag rab tu byos//
dman pa'isoms ni yongasaljongs la// rnam dag las ni rtag tu sgrubs/ khyod kyisams niban byos la// bla med chos nir du ston// mdo sde dam pa 'dalta bu // brtse ba can la
sbyin par gyis// bla med ye shesakang tshol ba// 'khor ba dag la 'jigs ma byed// desan sdig parnamasngasas// phan yon mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dper na blo dang ldan pa dag/
wa/ ma la spyod pa mkhas pa gang// ro rnamasasna tshogs sbyin byed kyang// mesanasrog bar yong mi 'gyur// gang zhig blo dang mi ldan pa// thabs dag la niyamakhas pas// me khyer lag
mthil gang bzhag pa// mesani rab tu sug par 'gyur// ji ltar mi zhig dug dag gis// sems ni 'khrugs nas smyos pa gang// ma la rab tu bsrosan ni// de yi rgyu yisasos pa
'gyur// zla 'od khyod kyis shes par gyis// blo ldan pa yang de bzhin du// yid rten yid ni stong par rig/ de phyir 'khor bar gsakyang ni// mag rten mgar stong rig pas//
mig la mdon par zhen pa med// gal te de ltar rab shisan// mig la gnas kyang nyon mongasamed// gal te mig nyid stong rig na// yang dag ye shes bsgrub par 'gyur// yang dag
ye shes thob pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te miganyid stod 'gan// 'dod chags dag gtan nas slong// 'dod chags dganamed pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni
'byung bar 'gyur// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang// ngar 'dzin 'chab dang khro ba dang// ser sna phrag dog ngo mad// mabazad sems namatho ba dang// rgyags dang mngon pa'i ngargyal
dang/ 3g.yo sgyu dang ni bag med dang// gya gyu la sogs rab tu yang// thams cad 'dod chags bzhin du bshad// yang dag yeshes thob gyur na// mag na zhib nyid du rtogs// zhib/
ki/ @#// nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir// 'od zer dgan 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag yashes thob gyur na// sangs rgyas tshul la rab tu gnas// tshul la rab tu gnas pa'i
phyir 3'od zer dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// yang dag ye shes thobagyur na// sangs rgyas thabs la gnas par 'gyur// thabs la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir// 'od zer dag ni 'byungabar
'gyur// yang dag ye shes ma bslabs par// sgrib pa dag ni gtanaspongs shing// 'od zer 'byung ba bsgrubapar// ngas sngon ma thos ma thong ngo// yang dag ye shes rab bsgrubs
nas// sgrib pa'i gnod pa gtan snying zhing// spyod pa 'dirjes gang 'brang ba// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i spyod pa ye ngas tshol zhing/ mdo sde 'di la bso byas
nas ) de bzhin gshegs la gang mchod pa// yang dag yeshes thabs thob 'gyur// yang dag ye shes gang bsgrubs nga// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par gyis// 'od zer
'gyed pa rdzogs par 'gyur// lag mthil 'bras bu jibazhinano// mig la bdagamed gang rmongs pa// dge sbyong choson nyams par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer
'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// mig la bdag med gang rtogs pa// dge sbyong chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// mig gi

mtha' zadagang rtogs pa// rna bska ba'i bra' yang rtogs// snabastaba'i mtha' rtogs pas// dag sbyong nang chos shes bya/ galamigagi ngo bo nyid// mtha' ni yongasum nges/// miganyis ba'i mtha' dag kyang//yongs shesapar mi 'gyur bas// gang thag

de yis de ltabu'i 'od zer 'gyedabathobami 'gyur//gtemagi ngo bo nyid//mtha' yos shes 'gyuran//mogazhi ba'itha' dag kyang//yongs shasapa nyid du 'gyur//gang zag de yis de lta bu'i/'od zer 'gudapathob par gyur//gal te mig gi ngebodi/mtha'adi
legs par ma shes na// mig rna skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang// legs pa nyid du mareshes pas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mgagi ngo bo/
nyid// mtha'ani legs par shes gyur na// mig ni ba'i mtha' dag kyang// legs pa nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par
'gyur// gal tamig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha'anamangon sum ma shes na// migani skye ba'i mtha' dag kyang// mngonasumanyid du mi shes pas// gang zag de yas de lta bu'i// 'od ze
'gyod pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mig na skya ba'amatha' dag kyang// mtha'ajimangon sumashes 'gyur na// mngon sum nyid du rab shes pas// gang zag de yis
de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gang bo 'di// mtha'ani legs par ma shes na// migani skyo ba'i mtha' dag kyang// yongs sushes par m 'gyur bas//
bya// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyedab thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// mtha'ani legs par shes gyuran// mig ni skya ba'amatha' dag
kyang mngon sum nyid du shes 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu // 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par ma shes na//
wA rna ba'i ngo bo rnam rig pa// legs pa nyid dum shes pas// gad shag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob mi 'gyur// gal te mig gi ngo bo nyid// rnam dag legs par
'a shis gyuran/ darna ba'i ngo bo rnam dag pa/ legs pa nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas// gang zag de yis de lta bu'i// 'od zer 'gyed pa thob par 'gyur// de bzhin sna dang lce dang lus//
yid dang gzugs sgra dri ro dang// reg bya chos dang sa chu dang// me rlung dag gis dngos po dang// 'jig rten sdug bsngal phung po dang// khams dang 'jig rten skye mched dang// sgra dang
ming la sogs pa yang// thams cad de bzhin rig par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
sems can gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing// 'od zer 'gyed pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa des dge ba'i rtse ba'i tshogs rnam pa brgyad cu po 'di dag mngon par
bsgrub par bya'o// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran pa dad gnodasemasamed pa dang/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa srung zhing/
tames par ma byed pa dang/ somasashin tu mnyam pa dang/ g.yo sgyu med pa dang/ ser sna med pa dang/ phrag dog med pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi bsam pa med pa dang// bslu ba'i
sam bamed pa dang/ theg pa chen pomado snga dam pa ngag mngon par yadaches pa dang/ dbang phyug dang rgyags pa la zhen cing sred pamed pa dang/ bzod pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs
pa dang/ smon lam las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'agyur pa dang/ dgon pan gnas pa dang/ 'khor rnams la mi rten pa dang/ redapa la mi rton pa
dang 3 grags pa lam rten pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams la rab tu gnas pa dang/ 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin rab du ston pa dang/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa dag la sgyu med par ram
gro byed pa dang/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag lamchog gibasam pa sbyang pa dang/ chos la gus pa'i phyir mkhan po dang slob dpon lashin tu bkur ba dang/ ma do sde 'di'i
don rab tu rtogs pa dang/ yang dag par bstan pa la rab tu mkhas pa dang/ tshigs pa rnams lami bdenapa med pa dang/ yang dag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa dang/ dge

nyu@#/// ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la brtson pa dang/ rtag tuspyin pa gtang ba dang/ bdud kyi las rab tu rtogs ba dang/ dbang po rnams dam du bsrung ba dang/ tshig rab tu brtags pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden
lamakhas pa dang/ sa rnamasakyi rangagimtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa dang/ gzungs zadamashes pa yongasasu tshol ba dang/ lus dang srog la 'phangs pamed pa dad/ 'khor bzhi po dag la rjes su
wA/ ston par byed pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'ibasam pa yongasasubacad pa dang/ 'jig rten phyi ma'i tshesamad do zhes zer ba'i log par lta ba rnams sngangs pa dang/ da dung ma bslabs pa dag la gya gyu'i
mtshan ma ston pa dang gang bslab par gyur pa dag la rinusakyis rnam par phunas rab ston pa dang/ glu dang rol mo'i sgra dag gi bsngags pam brjod pa dang/ rgyan dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi
bsngags pa mi brjodapa dang/ bden pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa dang/ mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs pa dang/ gnyid zab tu spangs pa dang/ yang dag pa'i chos yongasasu tshol ba
la rab tu brtson pa dad/ sangs rgyas la gus pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i las yongasasu spras pa dang/ bsub pa'i gnas rnams la yang dag par brtson
pa dang/ chos la sred pa'i phyir grogs khyad par can la rten par byed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnamasayosasutshol ba la skyo ba med pa dang/ rab tu 'byungab lashinatu mos pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi
chos srung zhing yongs su 'dzinapar byed pa dang/ sdig pa'i las misong ba dang/ bstan pa rnams la thetshomamed pa dang/ dpes ston pa la rab tumakhas pa dang/ gsang ba rnams rnam par phye nas

ston par byed pa dang/ byang nub chen po yosasu tshol ba la dal ba med pa dang/ mdo sngayang dagaparagazungab rnams rjod par byedapa dang/ rang gi bslab pamaspong ba dang/ pha rol gyi smra ba rnams tshar
gcod pa dang/ nges par 'byung ba'ilam yongs su tshol ba dang/ spyod pa tshad med pa rnams mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ chos kyi yoshes de dag lasasems nges par gyur pa dang/ rgyu dang
'bras bu gsal bar mthong zhing 'khor ba'i rgyunami gcod pa dang/ srid pa gsum po dag la chags pamed pa dang/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa dang/ mngon par yid ches pa dag la
gten bo rnam par gzhag nas ston par byed pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par s+sanapa'ibyi brag rtogs par khong du chud pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' yongs su shes pa dud/ gzhanagyi dring
la ma ltosapa dang/ yongs su spong ba'i spyod pa dag la brtson 'grus kyis grub par byed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad kyi bkod pa dag phun sumatshogs par byed pagang yin pa 'di
ni rnam pa brgyad cu zhes bya'o/// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chosabargyad cu po 'di dag ni chos lnga'i nang du 'jug par 'gyura'o// chos lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'kher bshesapa
[/ ]@#// dad 3 mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa dang/ nyon mongs pazad pa shes pa dang/ mchog tu gyur pa shesapa dang/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu shes pa gang yin pa'o/
gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu chos lnga po de dgan chos gnyis kyi nang du 'jug par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sems yongs su dag pas rtag tu brgyan pa dang/ gzugs yod

bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pamamanga' ba'i rnam par grol ba man par grub pa gang yin pa'o// gzhan yang zla 'od gzhon nu yang chos rnam pa brgyad cu yod de/ de dag
gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thogs pa mi mnga'aba'i rnam pa'agrol ba legs par yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'itshogs dang/
shes rab rgya chen por gyur pa dang/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongasasu sgrub pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba dang bralab dang/ nga rgyal rab tu bcom pa dang/ tshig mnyen pa dang/ dngos
po sna tshogs rab tu shes pa dang/ dgo ba'i grogs po yongasasushes padang/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pa dang/ spyod lam gyisasems can
'dul ba dang/ nyon mongs par lhung ba rnams kyi the tsom rab tugacod pa dang/ ma dag ba rnams lasod cing chos dkar po rnamasamangon bar sgrub pa dang/ mi dge ba'i grogs po dang ma 'grogs pa
dang 3 dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyod pa la yongasasu skyo ba med pa dang/ byang chub sems bskyed pa dang/ brtson 'grus zab purtsom pa dang/ bdud kyi dngos porab tu rtogs pa dang/ bden pa/
rnams mngon du gyur pa dang/ yang dag pa kho nar mchod pa byed pa dang/ the tshom yongasasu gcod pa dang/ somasakyis rtag tusems can yongasasu bzlub sems pa dang/ srid pa rnams 'amangon
pa' zhenang ne dpa dang/ sems rgya chen po yongs su shAskyed pa dang/ sems canam dge ba rnams la nyes dmigs yang dag par ston pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimug zab tu spong
ba dang/ 'dod pa'i phan pa yongasasu mi tshol ba dang/ sems can yongasasu smin par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'chos pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams la gus pa bskyed pa dang/

thag pa chen po la gnas pa dag la rten rnying rim gro byed pa dang/ theg pa dman pa dag gibasngags pamibarjod pa dang/ nyan thos kyi thog nga pa dag thag ring du sbyong ba dang/ phyi'i rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa
dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchodang rgya chen pobashamasas khyad par du 'phagasapa'i semasakyis dbul bar byed pa dang/ thogs pamed pa'i ye shes thog pa dang/ spobs pa phun

wA pa med pa dang// spyod pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ gzi byin chen podang ldan pa dang/ spobs pa thogs pamed pa dang/ mang du thos paphun sum tshogs pa dang/ ma ga ba rnams kyi bsngags pami brjod pa
dang 8 dge ba'i las yang dag par sgrub pa dang/ phung po rnams khong du chudapa dang/ lta ba rnams rab tu spangs pa dang/ rgyu'i ngo bo de rab tu rtogs pa dang/ spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa//
dang spyod yul ma yin pa yongs suspras pa dang 3 yongasasudang bskyed pa dang/ yang dag pa'i lam la gnasapa dang/ thogapa chen po la rab tu dga' ba dang/ mnyam pa nyid du yongs su sdud par
byed pa dang/ bdag med pa la mngon pa mchags pa dang/ 'khor ba la yongs su skyo bamed pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa yosasu tshol ba la mos pa dang/ 'dod pa chung ba'i phyir dgon pa na gnas pa dang/

rtag tu bsod snyomasaslong zhing le lo med par gyur pa dang/ ji tsam rnyed pa de tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang/ ngo med pa dang khrelamed pa spangs pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par byed pa dang/
dge ba'i grogs po dang lhan cig gnas pa dang/ bdagagi zlam yin pa rnams rab tu song ba dang/ so so'iny+tsa bo rnams la snying brtsa ba dang/ somasacan gyi sdod padang 'thun par byed pa dang/ sangs
rgyas la shin tu dang ba dang/ snod ma yin pa yongs su spong ba dang/ mimathun pa rnams la tshigasbyin pa'am byed pa rang/ gsol bam 'debs pa dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed pa dang/ gsol
ba 'debs pa zhig 'osan rogasapar ston par byed pa dang/ zas lasnyoms par gyur pa dang/ rtag tu gtong zhing mnyamapanyid du gtong ba dang/ sgo chen po phyi nas gtong bar byed pagang yan pa/
de dag na zla 'od gzhon nu chos rnam pa brgyad cu zhesabyaste/ 'di dag gisade bzhin gshegasab rnams kyi thogs pamamanga'aba'i rnam par grol ba thob par byedado// de'i tshe zla 'od

de sladaslob dponamamachis mkhyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// snga phyi'i mtha' la lde tsamamamachis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas na zlogamatha' rab mkhyen// de/
slad slob dpon ma mchisam khyen dang ldan// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skyon zlog de la the tshom mamachis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pasasngon dang phyi mtha'amakhyen// migakig
chang dag la 'dzin ma mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i yazhes grub gyur nas// snga phyimatha' laze tshom mamachis shog/ de bzhin gshegs pas skye zad mtha'amakhyen pas// mag gi ka) gachad dag la
'dzinam mnga'// bdag kyang de 'dra'i ye shes grub gyur nas// skye zad nyid la the tshom ma mchis shog/ gang zhig sngon ngang phyi mtha' ma rtogs pas// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen paskyed/ de
bzhin gshegs pa saden rab makhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhinam mnga'// gang zhig yodamadamatha'anam rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen paskyed// de bzhin gshegs pasade ni
rab makhyen pas// de slad 'dod pa dag la zhen mamanga'// gang zhig zad dang ma zad ma rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen pa skyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab m khyen pas//
de slad 'dod pa dag lazhen mamanga'// gang zhig 'jug dang ma 'jugam rtogs pa// des ni 'dod pa dag la zhen paskyed// de bzhin gshegs pas de ni rab makhyen nas// de slad 'dod pa dag la
zhenam mnga'// zhe sdang gtimug khong khro 'chalapa dang/ g.yo sgyu phrag drug nga rgyal 'dus pa dang// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang/ bsam
gan shes rab dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'drasakyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis rtogapa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'od zer
gsar gyi kha dog lta bu rab tu bkya'o/ 'od zer desakyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshadan da pa dpag tu med pa rnams snang bar byas to/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu phan pa dag byas nas/ bcom
ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nyid du thim par gyur to// de nas de'atsho byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dug pa'i stan las
langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ ngas mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lamago bos phyag byas te/ gus pas thal mo sbyar nas
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gisamangon par bstod de/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhus pa// 'brug dadaseng ga'i sasgrogs shing// ka la bing ka'i sgra phyung nas// chos rnga chen po'i sgra 'byin
pa/ 3 ru yoslad du 'dzum pa mdzad// tim stong bas khyad par 'phags/ rnam dag sgra rab dag dang ldan// yon tan ngo mtshar rab mnga' ba// cisad 'od zer bkyob mdzad// sbyani dad
tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtanashes rab rab brgyan pas// thams cad dgan yongs rdzogs pa// cisAd 'od zer bkye bamadzad// de bzhin gshegasapadabyang samanyes pas/ !
ngag rtsub rnams ni rtag tu spangs// sems can nadan legs gso ba// cislad 'od zer bkye bar mdzad// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mig rtag tu stong dbonamakhyen// rnam
ngag tshangs pa'i dbangs mnga' bas// sems can rnams la chos stonamadzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid sgra dang ming lasogs pas// kun 'byung 'gog pa lam dag dang// ye
shes bzod pa rab de bzhin// thugs rje chen po rkang gnyis gtso// mag zad spyi pa'i mtha' dag dang// rab zhi dang ni 'khor ba dag/ thams cad stong dbon nyid du mkhyen// rna bsna lce lus dang
yid// gzugs sgra dri'o rag bya nas// sgradang ming lasogs pa'ibar// thams cad kyang ni de bzhin no// gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung chos/ chad dang rtag pa yongs bralanas//
bdag dang gzhan gyis byas min pas// rkyenamang las byung nyid du gsung// res 'ga' rnam grus sna tshogasakyis// sdug bsngalagazhaniston par mdzad// res 'ga' don ni sna tshogs
kyis: sangs rgyas 'od zer bsngags par mdzad// res 'ga'atshiganatshad med kyis// rab dban chosan stonamadzad cad/ gang zogasrog dang bdagamed dad// sems can med pa/[4]
nyid du son// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad mad kyang// bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis// tshigasasu bcad pa brgya stong gis// de 'dra'i ngos niston par
mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pas yon tan chos// yang dag nyid ston mdzad kyang// brjod dang brjod byamamanga' bas// brjod mdzad chos kyang yongami mnga'// bcom ldan yang
dgachos gsung zhing// skye dgu rnams ni gomadzad pas// lha rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dag/ gang thos de dag rtogs par 'gyur// lha ma yin ni thams cad kyang// mos pa dag/
rnam par dag/ mi namang po tshad med kyang// the tshom dra ba chad par 'gyur// 'dod chags rang bzhin rab tu rtogs// zhe sdang gtimug rnam par bshig/ srid dang da rgyalam rika dang//
g.yo sgyu phrag dogasmros pa nas// sdug bsngal phung po la sogasapar// thamasacad kyang ni yongasasu spangs// 'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi don// mthar ni kun kyang rnam par dag/ de
bzhin goshegs pas chos gcig la// sna tshogs ming nArab makhyen pas// grangs nibargya stongamang po rnams // bsam gyisam khyab rab tu ston// sangs rgyas tshad medamang po las/
de 'dra'achosan legs bslabs pas// chos kyi dngos po gcig la yang// brjod pa thug pa med paston// de bzhin gshegs pasachosarnamasakyi// rnam grangs sna tshogs rab
mkhyen pas// ming tshig dang pobar ma dang// mtha' ma rnam 'byed rab tu mkhyen// tha dad tshaganasna tshogs dag/ thams cad rab tu bslabs pas na// don mchog dgan gya nom pa[}]
ston pa dag la rab tumakhyen: de 'dra'i dbus na rnam dag pa// rgyu rkyen tshogasapa las byung bas/ lce 'bab zhig la rten pa nas// lusemasabar la rtenapa'ang min// san rnamapa drug
tu g.yos// phyogs bcu'i 'khor na yongs 'dus nas// bralasbyar bcom ldan zhal ldan// thertsom dag ni bsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pas mig zad dang// skye mtha'
dgarang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong zhing dben pa dang// 'gro 'od med par rab tu mkhyen// bzhugs dang gnasanamomanga' bas// yang dag mtha' la rab tu bzhugs// bcom
ldan spyanani thogs mi mnga'// de slad dung bdag zhu ba lags// de bzhin gshegs pasamag nyid kyi// sngon dang phyi ma'amatha' dag kyang// zad dngam zad 'khor ba ni// rang bzhin
stong dben rab mkhyen pas// chosakya don rnams ba phye nas// 'jig rten rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ dathub pa dbyang sasnyan rab manga' bas// slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom
ldan sngon dang phyi mtha' dang// miganyid stod dben rab makhyen cing// rnam rtog tsheg dang bral lags n// risad 'as paston par mdzad// bcom ldan mang na dpagamed dang// brjod
pasna tshogs rang bzhin gyis// rtag tu stong dbon mkhyen lags n// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan zad dang skya mtha' dang// mig nyidastong dben rab
mkhyen cing// nyon mongs rnams ni yongs spangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub mkhyen pa brnyes// grags pa mchog ni phunatshogs pa// cesad 'jul pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan
un ring bsgom bslabs pas// bsam gyis ma khyabaston par mdzad// mganyid stong pa nyid du mkhyen// du bral rtagatu rnam par dag/ sems kyi spyod pa tshadamed rnams // dgongs pa gcig
gi thams cad mkhyen// 'od zer 'jig rten snang mdzad pa// 'di ni gang gi snga rtags lags// drang srong chen pomangon sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyad par 'phags// nyonamos dgan rab
bsal bas// thugasan rtag tu zhi zhing dben// de bzhin gshegs pamkhyen mchog gis// mig zadamatha'ani rab tu rtogs// rgyu dang rkyenani gang gi slad// deng 'dir 'dzum pa ston par
mdzad// rna ba sna lce lus dang yadi/ yul drug dang ni'abyung chen bzhi// sgra dang ming lasogasapa'i bar// thams cad kyang ni di bzhin no// bcom ldan mig la bdag med mkhyen// rna ba
mi rtag nyid du rtogs// snanyid stong par 'bamakhyen na// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan lce la bdagamedamakhyen// lus kyang mirtag nyid du rtogs// sems nyid stongapar
rab mkhyen n// tsaslad 'dzum pa ston pa mdzad// bcom ldan gzugs la bdag med mkhyen// sgra yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dri nyid stong par rab mkhyenan// ci slad 'dzum paston par
mdzad// bcom ldan ro la bdag mdamakhyen// reg byami rtag nyid du rtogs// chos nyidastong par rab mkhyen n// cisang 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan s la bdag med mkhyen/ ]
chu yang ma rtag rked du rtog/ mnyid stong par rab mkhyenan// tsaslad 'dzum paston par mdzad// bcom ldan rlung la bdagamed mkhyen// de bo mi rtag nyid du rtogs// dngos nyid stong pa/
rab mkhyen nas// cisud 'dzum pastonaparamadzad// bcom ldan 'jig rten bdag med mkhyen// sdug bsngal mi rtag nyid du rtogs// phung po stong par rab mkhyen na// n+tisad 'dzum pa
ston par mdzad// bcom ldan khams la bdag med mkhyen// 'jig rten mi rtag nyid du rtogs// skyo nyid stong par rab makhyanan// cisnyad 'dzum paston par mdzad// bcom ldan sgra la
bdag med mkhyen// ming yang mi rtag nyid du rtogs/ lam nyid stong par rab mkhyenan// ta slad 'dzum paston par mdzod// bcom ldan ye shes bdagamed mkhyen// rab dbenamartag
nyid du rtogs// sems can stong par rab mkhyen na// cuslad 'dzumapa ston par mdzad// bcom ldan rang bzhin rang bzhin med// bdag dang bdag med pa yang mkhyen// mos paston par
@#/ rab mkhyenan/ sud 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// 'khor ba bdagamed nyid dugazigs// rtag dang ma reg pa yang mkhyen// myang n 'das pastongamkhyen n// ci
snyad 'dzum pa ston bston par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rnamasagrol/ grags pa khams gsum kun tu gang// brgya byin ma yi dbang po dang// klu rnams lasogs kun
gyis mchod/ de bzhinagashegs pas mag zad dang// skye mtha'arab dben mkhyen lags n// ci slad 'dzum pa ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas sras ni tshadamed pa// 'khor
'di'i krams cad rab tu 'dus// sangs rgyus gsung las skyes ba dang// chos lasasngal te gang byung ba// thams cad bcom ldan spyan sngar mchis// gus pas h+phalamo rab
sbyar lags// 'khor 'dus de dguslad dun// 'od zer rgyu rkyen 'di zhu lags// de bzhin gshegosapas mig nyid ni// stong zhing bdag medamakhyen pas na// khyim naganas/
pa'i rnal 'byor pa// thams cad las ni yang dag 'dus/ de bzhinagashegs pas chos rnams // bye brag med cing mnyamamakhyen pa// bcom ldan dgongasapas rab mkhyenagyi//
rdzu 'phrul dag gis gzigs ma yin// bcom ldan mag la bdagamedamakhyen// ngo bo nyid stong 'gro 'ong med// rnam dag mkhyon patshad ma mchis// tisad 'dzum paston par mdzad//
bam po gsum pa// de bzhin gshegs pa skya mtha' rab zad pa// thugs rje chen pos 'jigartenakun bamadzad// chos rje mchog gyur mi
yi gtsor gyur pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dang 'a chen po tshad ma mchis// gzhan yang lhatshogs gzi byin che ba rnams / mkha' lagadugs
ni dem pa dag kyang thogs// sa chen 'din rab tu g.yos par 'gyur// gang zhig sngon ni de bzhinagashegs pa las/ yun ring dge ba'achos ni gang bsgrubs pa// ratab par dga'
mdzad thugs rje chen po'i gtso// ci spyod 'dzum pabastanamadzadabazhud dug dol// gang zhig sngon nas sa rgyus 'bumachod nas// chos 'di bris nas ngega' ba rab skyes nas/ 'dun pa
rab mchog mi yi gtsor gyur pa/ tsisnyad 'dzum pa bstanamadzad bshad du gsol// bcom ldan gsung ni mod po dga' mdzad pas// bya rgyal ngang pa shin tu dbungs rab sun// sasnyan tshad
mdu rang gi ngang gis 'byung// cuslad 'od zer 'dibakyi bshad du gsol/ tshigs bshad bye ba tshad ma mchis pa yi// rjes 'thun gsung gi bsngags pa brjod 'gyur zhing// kun tse'i
yasgraskad mchog ldan pa// nuslad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol// 'brug sgra zabamos chos nibastan pa'asas// 'jig rten brgya stod dpagared grags gyur pa// thugs rjes
[r/ g]@#/ tshig rtsub yan 'jam ston pa// ci slad 'od zer gsar gyi kha dog bskye// skya dang mi skya zad du ma zad mkhyen// mig nyid bral zhing 'gro 'ong med bar rtogs// 'jig
rten snang mdzad bdud rtsi'i mchog gyur ba// cesmad 'od zer gsar gyi kha dog bkye// mig gi 'byung ba rtag tustong dbon dang// 'gro 'ong ma mchis gnas pa mamachis dang// smig rgyu chu
wA/bur lta bu r rab mkhyen pa// rgyu rkyen gang gi slad du 'dzum bstan lags// de bzhin rna ba sna lce lus dad yid/ gzugasas ri rig bya chos rnams nas// sgra dang ming la sogs
pa'i bar du yang// thams cad de bzhin du na reg par bgyi// rdo rje rtag pa'i sku dang ma 'jig sku// mtshanamchog brgya stong dag ni phunasum tshogs// sku la 'khrul 'khor mi mnga'
g.yomadzad pa// rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzumaMmadzadabashad du gsol// byin pa zlum zhing zhabs kyi rdod par ng// phyag gi mtshanam mi gda' sang ge 'dra// lte ba shin tu zab cing ched
rgyasab// rgyu rkyen gangoslada'adzum mdzadabashad du gsol// gser sku rnamadago rdul dang dri mesdus/ khaspu re re kha dog mthonamathing ldan// g.yas su 'khyil cing spos kyi ngad ldang ba/
rgyu rkyen gang slad 'dzamamadzad bshad du gsol// skumchog dam pa yongs rdzogs rtag gnas pa// dbaranan grod+ha yishing rgyal bzhin// yon tan thams cad kyisani rab tu brgyan// gsud
dbyangs dag gis 'khor ni dga' bar mdzad// dpud pas zhing phrag pa sdug lamadzes// gtsug tor yongs rdzogs g.yas su 'khyil bar gda'// ningan brgya stong dpag mad rgyu b.ramadzad
sems can leg dang yang dag lam stonamadzad// tshems dkar dri mi mnga' bas dung dang 'dra// lcagasamtshanasrid 'di nalan kun tu khebs// 'gram pasang ge 'dra zhing shangs kyang mtho//
thamasacad thabs dang rnam dag thugs las skyes// ut+pal yabasungan zhal nas 'byung// tsan dan dri dag sku kun tu khyab// sngonani byams pa rgya cher bsgoms pasan// rnam dag mes
pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabasamathil shin tu mnyam// sa la regakyang rdulan gsam 'gyur// gom pa seng ge glang po che 'dra bas// 'jig rten thams cad
lasani yang dag 'das// 'khor lo rtsibasastong mtshan gyis mdzes par brgyan// khyad 'phags 'od zer dag na reb tu gsal// dge ba dag gis skye dgu pan 'dogs pas// gang gisan brang
ba dang ba rab tu skye// sor gcig 'od zer brgya stong rab bkye nas// sangs rgyasazhing ni debagamed snang bar mdzad// sngonani dge spyod mang bor rab bsgrubs pas// mtshan gyis dkod pasnatshogs
'di brnyes lags// gzugs sku yongs rdzogs dpo zla yongs ma mchis// zhal mtshan dbamardzesashin tu khyad par 'phags// rdzu 'phrul dag gis 'jig rten phan 'dogs pa// slang/
0 @#// 'dzum pa bstanamadzod bshad du gsol// byin pa ra degasaar+ya ya dang 'dra// sku dbyibs midagu sang gi ji lta bzhin// 'jig rten byung nas 'jig rtenasnad mdzad
pa3 8ci slad 'dzum pakhastanamadzad bshad dugasol// cang shasabazhin dumtshan sbas rdul mimanga'// phyag mthil mnyam rgyas phugan pusamo 'das// mi yi sang gi ngomatshar khyad par 'phag
ci slad 'dzum pa bstanamadzad bshad du gsol// sku las 'od zer dpag med rab 'gyed cing// kha dogagyanom rab zhi rtag gsal ba// rnam dag thugs ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad// mdo sde tshang
tsho med pa dag ston par mdzad// rtag dang chad pa dag la gnas pa yis// de 'dra'i chos ni bsgrub par 'gyur ma lags// gang gis mthar lta rnams ni 'ab sngangasan/ bcom ldan rnam dag sa ni
myur thob 'gyur// lha rje 'brugasgra gsung ni kun grags shing// ka lan ta ka'i dbus snyanarab tugasal// lha yi glu sgra brgya stong mang ldan pa// slad 'od zer bkye ba bshad du gsol//
pasaMgasungagacig tun chos bstanapas// 'jal pa'i tshul khrims cad dag rgyun yadabacad// de bzhin gshegs pasabadas rab gang gsungs pa// dekun zab cing ngomatshar mos lags so/
khyu mchogasmin mtshams 'od zer rab bkye bas// sangs rgyas zhing nabargya stong gsal bar mdzad// spyanamchog dag kha dog mthon mthing 'dra// btsugator mtshan mkha' yi lhas memathong/
[p]tshems dkar gtams pa bzhi bcu dag dang ldan// dper na rin chen chu shel dag dang mtshungs// dge ba'i 'phrin lasatshadad dag las skyes// cisnyad 'dzum pa bstanamadzad bshad du gsol//
de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rdzogasang 'asku// kha dog dam padapagamed phun tshogs shing// 'od zer rnam dag ngomatshar rab bkye ba// cislad 'dzum pabastan mdzad bshad du gsol// thugs
rje chen pomchog rgyal rkang gnyis gtso// sems can yang dag bsam pathugasasu chud// thogs pa ma mchis spobs pa mchog bshes pa// ci slad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du gsol/
de bzhin gshags pas pha rol rab byon pas// rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug phun tshogs// rnam dag 'od zer dpag med ston mdzad pa// tsaslad 'dzum pa bstan mdzad bshad du
gsol// bcom ldan sngon na bskal pa dpag medasnyed// bcom ldan brgya stong nyid lamachod pa mdzad// de 'dra'i rgyu 'bras 'chab zhim 'tshal ba// ci slad 'dzum pa bstanamadzadabashad
du gsol// bcom ldan sngon nibaskal pa dpag med snyad// ting 'dzin mchog rnams la ni rab bzhugs pas// mig gamatha' zad ba'amatha'amkhyen n// caslad 'dzum pa bstan/
mdzad bshad du gsol// 'das pa dang nam 'ongs da ltar dus// 'dren pas de dag kun n btumakhyen// rnam dgamakhyen pa thogasamed bsam mi khyab// ci slad 'dzum pa bstanamadzad
bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i mdun du phyagagasar gyi kha dog lta bu brgya nga ste// zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo/
la bzhag nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// gzhon nu ni tulegs par nyon// san ded 'dir byang chub chos// 'od zer rab tu ston pa'i mdo// khyod la shin tu yongs gtad
kyis: rnam 'ongs h+pha ma dus ngan tshe// chos 'di rnam par 'jig pa na// khyod kyisasems can rnams la ni// rab tu phye nas bshadapar gyis// ngasan sangs rgyas sman dag gis/
ma 'os tham dus kyi tshe/ shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i// mdo sde dam pa 'di dag la// gang mos gang nam mos pa// thams cad kun kyang gzigs shang mkhyen// sems
can dag ni gang zhig gis// byang chub lam 'dirab tshol pa// rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes dran zhing// mdo sde 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// gang zhig dad pa rab 'jig cing// 'du 'dzi
la ni mos gyur dang// nyan mtshan gnyis la gang dga' ba// mdo sde 'di lamos mi 'gyur// nga yi bstan pa dag la ni// rab tu byung bar gyur nas kyang// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos
dag la// mos pa dag namaskya ba/ skyes bu blun po de dag ni// dad pas byin pa chud gson 'gyur// 'dus byas rnamasakyi chos dgo la// nyes dmigs mang bar thos nas ni//
'jig rten dag lamangon zhen nas// 'jigs pa dag ni moskye ba// skyes bu blun po de dag ni// mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par 'gyur// chos gos dag nibagos gyur kyang// de lashes/
rab ci yang med// thub pas legs par gsungs pa yi// yang dag dga' n gang yin pa// shes pa med pas thos gyuran// yadi ches len pa'am 'gyur te// skyas bu blun po de dag dang//
lhan cig gnas par mi bya'o// khyad par 'phags pa'i chos 'di dag/ gal te shes par gyur nas kyang// rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems kyang skyo b.ram 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i
gang zag dag la// ngas ni rab tu smod par byed// ma lus thob par gyur yod kyi/ don donamed chud zos yin// galateshin tu zab pa'i chos// 'di dag shes par gyur nas ni//
rab tu dga' zhing mos pa yi// sems ni rab tu skye 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i gang zag de dga'// sngon chadasangs rgyas phrad pasan// gdon zab kho nar ni// bla med byang chub thob
par 'gyur// skyesa'u blunapogang dag gcig/ lta ba ngan ngas rab rmas nas// shes rab sroganagacod byed pa// byang chub yosasu spong bar 'gyur// de lta bas na mi dge ba'i//
bshes gnyen dag ni reb songs nas// blo ldan mkhas pa dag lani// brten cing gusapa bskyod par bya// 'jig rten ngagan thoms cad n// zhes dmigs tshad med gang yod pa// sems
can ngan song gsum por ni// rtag tu bying bar gang bzhed pa// thams cad gtiyugarmongs pa yi// rgyu dang rkyen las byung bsan// tonamongs rjesasu 'jul/
byad cing// rang dbang dgan thob ma 'gyur// yang dgachosan sdod byed cing// chosam yin paspyod par byed// de ltabasan rmongs pa yi// skyes bu dmanapasrang bar bya// ji ltar kha lo
skyar ba yis// rang gis srog shing bcog pathazhani/ mi dge lasan byas pasan// sems can dmyal bar skyes bar 'gyur// khanas tshig ngan phyung nasan// rtag tu bdag laganod
byedapa// ji ltar sta re rno thogs nas// rang gi lus ni gcod byed 'dra// chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen dag gis// byas pa'ilasakyi rjesasunI rnamasminamyod bsgrubasamed par// de
ltar khong du ma chud pas// 'jig rten drang srong la brtenanas// dge ba'i grogs po yisnyam sems// denas rang nyid 'di snyam du// stong pakidanagangaskomang// 'dus ma byas n rtogs
snyamanas// chad par lta bskyed par byed// lus nasnod chag pa dang 'dra// sems kyang rjesasu 'gag 'gyur zhes// phalacher bkyalapa'atshig dag la// mongs pa nyid du rab 'gyur
zhing 3 )'di la mngon par zhon pasan// phan pa'i donani ci yang med// gal te sprulani gdug pa yis// gnod pa dag ni rab byas kyang// nam yang skye dgu mang po rnams // ngan 'gro
dag tu ltadam byed// blunapo gang zhig chos ston pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig byed pas// skye dgu mad po tshadamed snyad// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar byed// khyed la sogs pa 'khor
'dus pa// 'di lta bu ran lta bar gyis// deng 'dir nga yan sngar ni// zla 'od gzhon nu gad 'dug pa// 'dis ni sngon chad 'das pa yi// sangs rgyas dag ni bcom ldan 'das//
tshad med gang+ga'i klung dzisnyad// mchod pa 'am gro rab byas shing/ shin tu brtan par yongs bsgoms nas// bla med ye shes btsal bsan// srid pa dag ni thams cad la// sems kyis
gnas pa tilangamid// mig giskyamatha' gtan du ni// rnam par dag par shes pa sa na// spros pa dgan yongasaspangs nas// mngon par zhen pa ci yang med// sems can dag ni
tshad med la// phan pa dag ni bya ba'aphyi'i// bla med 'od zeraston pa yi// mdo sde dag niston par byed// skyes bu blun po gang yin pa// chos 'daslob par ma nus pas=/ rnal 'byor
sgom pa dag la na/skyon nyid du yad lta bar byed// de lta bas na blun po dag/ thag ring por ni yongs spangasanas// de dag la brten ma byed// de ya chos kyadamibaslab bo// skyes
bu blun po gang yin pa// rtsod pa'osmra lamasapasan// rtsod smramadapa'i spyod pa la// nan tan bsgrub par mi nus pas// skyes bu de dga rnams la ni// tshul bzhin semasani ci yang
med// de lta bas na de dag la// bsnyen bkur ma bya bsngagasamabarjod// skyes bu blunapo gang yin pa// le lo snyoms las la gnas pas// rtag tu lus
[D ]dang dag yid kyi// mi dag 'i las ni spyad pasan// de la tshul khrims dag pa dang// shes rab mad thos na 'dra yang// rtag par 'dod pa'i yul samasashing// 'du 'dzi dag la mos par
byed! dakhyed kyis 'di ltar blun po de// rigs dang rus dang lus kyang ni// dman pa yin par rab tu ltos// khong khro bka' blo mi bde zhing// byad bzhin dug ni mi sdug la/ 'grol
dge ba'i gnas skyes kyang/ lus ni rtag tu ma rabs 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes la zhen pas// yang dag don larmongs par 'gyur// blo gros dag dang ma ldan pas// tshag gi bye brag
'byed mi nus// rang bzhin stodapa'achos thos kyang// de la mosapaskya mi 'gyur// de bzhin gshegasapa bcom ldan 'das// yun ring po nas 'jig rten pa'i// tshig gispros pa gang
kyi yin pa// thams cad rab tu phyungs pa yin// so so'i skyobos 'di dag la/ shin du zhen cing chags pasan/ ji srid 'tsho yi bar du yang// rtogs shing khong du chud mi 'gyur/
tshul khrims bsngags pa rjod byed kyang// tshangs par spyod bsgrub ma byed// khanas chos ni ston byed kyang// lus kyis chos minaspyod par byed// rang gis 'dul ba ston byed kyang// rtag
tu 'dulan spyod par byed// sangs rgyas slob ma dag lani// kha dog bsgyur ba'agis gyon gsungs// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dag gis// gos 'di'i ba tu bgos gyur kyang// nga/
rgyal dang nibagamed pa'i// sems ni rab tu 'phel bar byed// dad pas byin pa ci zos pa// grulum 'bar ba med pa 'dra// de ltar khyim gyi gnas sbas nas// 'dod pa lnga yi bde
ba'ang med// gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos dag la// mchogagi bde bam thobanas// spyod pa 'drenamamos byed pas// mtha' gnyis dgan song mi 'gyur// yid kyi mos pa ji snyid ba/
thams cad kyang n ngegami 'gyur// de 'dra'i gang zag blun po ni/ 'khor mang nang du gnas gyur kyang// dper na ji ltar u0f8bskyes ngag/ sang ge'i khyur ni zhugs pa bzhin// de ltar rab tu
zhi ba yi// chosan yang dag bstan byas kyang// de'on dngastong pa'i don// rtogs shing khong du ma chud pas// 'kheramang dag la bstan bsngags kyang// khengs pa'i semasani skyed
par byed// ston pa chen po ma dron pas// ngo tsha dman pa'i semasakyang yod// mi gtsang dngos po len byed kyang// yid bzhin nor bu thob pa bzhin// shin tu dga' bas 'dzin byed/
pas[;]sems kyis cung zad gtongami byed// 'di lta'uyam rabs dag/ khyimanas rab tu byung nasan// spyod lam dag kyang srung ba dang// chos gos lhung bzed 'dzin byed kyang//
[n]@#// cha byad tsam dang ldan pasan// yang dag shes rab cayang med// khaspu dgan brags gyur kyang// sdig pa'isomasanam song zhing// dge sbyong ma yin pa yi chos//
log lta dag tu lhung 'gyuran// rab dben mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// de dag rab tu nyams par 'gyur// dge sbyong mngon du bya ba yin// 'bras bu dag kyang 'thobama'agyur// ma rig
wA/ nyon mongs rnams kyang ni// rdul tsam nyams bar ma'agyu'o// grong khyer dag tu rnam rgyu zhing// rang nyid dben pa'i bsngags brjod kyang// skyesabu blun po blo med pas// yang dag bgrod
sa pa shes mi 'gyur// sems kyi 'dun pa tu yod pa// de dag thams cad mi dge yin// rnyedapa 'dod pa rgyu yi phyir// dgon pa dag na gnas byed kyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i yang dag rgyu/
bsgrub pa'aphyoranam yin no// rmugs dang gnyid la rab tu dga'// lus ni ji ltar bde snyam nas// rtag tu de lta'i dngos po dag/ bsgrub pa la nims par byed// dgon pa'i gnas ni de
dag tu// lo nimadapor gnas byed kyang// phyin log lta bar gyurapa'i phyir// mya ngan 'das lam stor bsan// nams kyang dge sbyong lam dgagi/ 'bras bu dga' thobam 'gyur//
yang dag lta ba rab tams shing// tshul khrims dag dang 'gal byas pas// gos bzang dag gis lus brgyan par// de la shin tu spyod par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i bde ba rnams la ni//
rtag tu srid pa skyed par byed// gal tegrong khyer zhugs na yang// nga rgyalamtshanamaston byed cing// lus kyi lasanAmosrung bas// spyod lam dag la gnasam byed// res 'ga' grong
khyer zhugs nasan// rgyatsherang nyid 'di skad du// dgon pa'i gnasan de dag tu// ri phug ngaganagang yodapa// khyed rnams 'di ltarangashes par gyis// de ni bdag gi gnas yin te//
mtho dman sman par lta ba dang// 'grogom tshul la gnasaso zhes// tha dad mtshanama'i tshig brjod de// dgra bcom pa ya rtags bstan pas// khyim pa gan ji snyed pa// phan tshun du'i
'di skad du// dgon pa'i dag slong gang yin pa// yang dag 'phags pa yin zhes zer// res 'ga' dgon pa de dgan// gnas par gyur pa de yitshe// gal te gzhan dag 'ongs gyur na//
'di lta bu ran ston par byed// bdag ni dgon gnas 'di dag tu// nyin mtshan 'chag par byed ce 'am// yang n rtswa 'jam bting nasan// 'dir ni 'dug par byed ces bar// res 'ga'
grong khyer zhugs gyur nas// khyim pa'ader ni phyin pa'itsi// g.yo sgyu nAn tan 'di skad du// bde 'am zhes ni 'dri bar byed// 'jig rten pa yi 'du 'dzi'i gtam// rgyal po chom rkun la
sogs pa'i// sna tshogs dganarjod bar byed// res 'ga' 'chags pa'isams dag gis// bud med rnams kyi mdun dag tu// thabasan rnam pasnatshogs kyis// rang gi yon tan rjod pa

nasamachod par byed// btsun pas thugs rjer rab ngagos shing// bdag cag thad du yang gshegs zer// ro zhim dag la zhen chags shing// nyes dmigs rnams ni mishes pas//
bdud kyis grags kyang rnyed gyur nas// rus sbal rgya mos zin pa 'dra// dgon par gnas pa dag la yang// rnyed pa dag gis snyoms par byed// dgeslong brtson 'grus can dag la//
bsashing skur pa 'debs par byed// rnyed dang gragasarasasams rmongs pas// yang nas yang du zhen pa skyed// lus ni yongs su gso ba'i phyir// rtag tu g.yo sgyusbyod pasan/ lus
dad gagi mo dgu las// yang nas yang du 'phel bar byed// gal te sbyin bdag dad pa yis// dang ba'asamasakyis mchodan yang// le losnyom las dbang gisani// de yi bsod
nams 'bri bar byed// skyesabu blun po de dag// rtag dum ngag 'dod skyid pas// stong pa nyid kyichos 'di la// rjesa'athun bzod sems 'thob mi 'gyur// gang dag nga yi bstan pa[II]

sogs// 'jig rtenachos kyisam g.yos pa// chos 'di thos pa dka'am 'gyur// lus la mi gtsang 'du shes dang// phung po rma yi 'du shes dang// zasani rme bskus 'dushes
na 8chos 'di thos pa dka'am 'gyur// gos gtsang ngag ni thob gyur kyang// dregs pa dganamipyad cing// ngotshadag phyir gosagyon pa// chos 'di thob pa dka'ami 'gyur//
gzugs dang stobasanam snyoms shing/ zas la chags bsad pa dang// srog gnas phyi'i nigang za ba// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// srid pa 'di ston shes nas// 'dod pa
dag la blang dor med// rtag tu stong dbenagang spyod pa// chos 'di thob pa dka' mi 'gyur// dpag tshad gcig 'dus ri khrod du// gcig pu 'duganas mnyam gzhag cing// 'dus
byas bdag medagang rtogs pa// chos 'di 'brob bar dka'am 'gyur// mig zad skye ba'imatha' dag dang// miga'ajugamtshan nyid rtogs byed cing// mig gtsang laman rab bsgrubapa
chos 'di thos par dkaM'am 'gyur// rnabasna lce lus dang yid// gzugs sgradri'i rig bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang// thams cad kun yang de bzhin no// de bzhin ma 'ongs dus kyi
nusu// tshe/ 3dag slong dag tshadamadasnyad// brtson pa dang na le lecan// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dag dang ma dgagrogs po dag/ bsgrub pa dang ni mi
bsgrub pa// yid ches pa dang yid maches// thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis// dge dang mi dge grogs po dag/ mag brad lamanigang yin pa// bsgrub pa dang nimabasgrub// thams
cad de bzhin shes par gyis// gang zhig byang chub rab mos shing// zla gcig gnyis gsuma'adasanasan// dus gzhan phyir na gang ldeg pa// thams cad de bzhin shesaMpar gyis//
gang zhig chos 'di thos gyur nas// mos pa'isams ni/dbaskyed pa// gal te nyams par gyur nayang// slar na dang ba thob pa 'gyur// gang zhig chos 'di thos gyuranas// bag
mdaspong b.ram byed pa/ mdo 'disangs rgyas bka' ma yin// de snyams du nisims par 'gyur// gang zhigachos 'di thos gyuranas// bdud kyis yongasasu gang bzung ba// dang
po dad pa skyesagyur kyang// phyisan rab tu spong bar 'gyur// gang zhigachos lam mos pa// mi bden grags dang nad patshol// grong khyer grong rdzal 'bargyu zhing// gzungs rnams dang ni
ting 'dzin dang// kun 'dzin 'od zer bsngags brjod kyang// de yas yang dag rtogasama'agyur// 'dod pa lnga pos bcings pa dang// 'jig rten losan 'dod tshol ba// brjod pa
dang ni rtog byed pas// stong nyid sgom la skur pa 'debs// dran dang shes rab sams med dus// tshe zad bar du don med 'das// blun pos stong pa'i chos spong ba// den tshul khrims/
bgagasabyas pas// mnar med dag tu ltung bar 'gyur// namasakyang mtho ris yong mi skya// gang gis skad cig gcig lan mchod rten stong nabus pa bas// gang gsimado sde 'di/
grosanas// tshig bzhi tshigs bcad gcig 'dzin 'phags// me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong dag/ sangs rgyas mchod rten mchod pa bas// gang gis mdo sde 'dishesanas// tshig bzhitshigs
cad sams pa 'phags// gang gis rin chen mchod rten dag/ gang+ga'i byesnyad byas pa bas// gang gis thanaskad cig tsam// mdo sde 'disems khyad par 'phags// sangs
rgyas zhing ni 'bum phragabargya// me tog gtor nas mchod pa bas// gang gis tha na skad cig tsam// mdo sde 'di sims khyad par 'phags// chosagros 'bum phrag rgya mang po// sas
rgyas rnams la phul ba bas// gang gse thanaskad cig tsam// mdo sde 'disoms khyadabar 'phags// sangs rgyasaspyanani rnam dag 'phags// mamkhyen magazigs gang yang med//

'dini ba gzungs// rgya cheraston par shig ces smras// gang gis chos 'dithosagyuranas// zhe sdang sems ni mi skyid pa// gzung 'dzin klog cing gang 'don pa// de ni skyes bu

ni byad bzhin bzang bo thob par gyur/ nor med pa rnams ni nor dang ldan par gyur/ bu med pa rnams dbu yod par gyur/ gos med pa rnams ni gos thob par gyur/ rin po che med pa rnams

rgyus par gyur// mi 'jigasastobs kyis leg tshogs rab btul nas// byang chub chen po mchog namyur du brnyes/ de bzhin skad cig yud tsam lha rnams kyis// bcom lan byung

yongs su gdungs pa rnams // mi gtsang bsgoms pa bshad thos pas// 'dod chags zhis ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'itshe// zhe sdang ngagags
gdungs pa rnams byams pa bstan pa'i chos thos pas// zhe sdang zhis ma lus spangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'atsho// gtamug dag gis gdungs pa rnams //
shes rab chosan bstan thos pas// gtamag zhis ma lus spangs// phacom ldan grong khyer gshigs pa'i tshe// nga rgyal dag gis gdungasang rnams // nga rgyal spangs pa'i tshes
thos pas// nga rgyal zhi ste ma lus sngas// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// phrag dog dag gis gdungasapa rnams / phrag dogaspangs ba'i chos thos pas// phrag dog
zhi ste ma lus sngangs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tsho// khong khro dag gis gdungs pa rnams // bong khro sras pa'i chos thos pas// khong khro zhisam lus spangs//

mad mkha' las ngo bo nyid// nges pa nyid du stong pa dang/ da'agro 'ong med cing mtshanamad dang// ci yang med pa'isgra yang thos// gzhan yang sems can brgya stod dag/ mkha'
las sha dang shes rab sngan/ de bzhin chos kyi spyan bar du// yang dgaston pa'i sgra yang thos// bcom ldan rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis ni// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab sgra//
rnam grol rnam grol mthong ba'i sgra// ston pa dgakyang thos par gyur// sems can dgan jisnyed pa// ji bzhin rdzu 'phrularab bstan nas// ji ltar rjes 'thunas+saskad kyis// yang

ston/ rnabcom ldan rdzu 'phrulastobs kyis// sems can dbang po ji lta bzhin// rgya cher yang dag 'byed mdzad pas len 'dzanaston la 'god par mdzad// bcom ldan rje
'phrul stobakyis ni// phung po khams dang skye mched kyis// bcings dang grol dang nye ring dang// sa yi gnas skabasabye brag gis// mtshan nyidi ston pa thos par 'gyur// gzhano

ts+tshA sprul nas// mkha' las skyo ston sgra thos pas// gang thos 'dod chagasasel mdzad pas// shAri'i bun ji lta bzhin// shin tu dang ba skyes par gyur// thugs rjes mos
pa ji bzhin du// bla med tshes ni ston par mdzad// mo'u 'gal dang ni 'od srungs dang// ka pin dang kun dga' dang/ 'od srungs chen po dag dang ni// kun shes ko'u di
tshe rgya la sogs// de dag mos pa ji bzhin du// nyan thos chosaston byos par gyur// lha rnams dang ni lha ma yin/ gnod sbyin dganamang po dang// be'o kani 'khor bcas dang//
grul bum dgan yod med rnams // bcom ldan rdzu 'phrulastobs kyis// gzungs sngags sgra thos par gyur// i desi/ ba dosaM/ i ra su a'o/ o nas/

gis/ da'akhor skor sangs rgyas sku ston pas// da ltar mazong ba jibazhinano// bsam gyis mi khyab zhing dag tu// sprul patshad med stonamadzad pas// skams nas kom/
bdun gshegs dang// rgyal srid spangs nas rab byung dang// byang chub snying por sangs rgyas nas// brnyes pa'i chos dag rab dgongs te// chos kyi'akhor
laskor mdzad dang// mya ngan 'das paston par mdzad// rdzu 'phrul gyinistobs dag gis// snatshogasachos nistonamadzad pas// sems can dag ni tshad med rnams // khyad 'phags
ye shes grub par mdzad/ 'du tshe thugasarjechen po yis// tshas pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// byams chos bsgom pabashad bstan pas// byams pa'isaMms ni 'phel

thugs rje chen po yis// klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor nas// zhe sdang nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// zhe sdang sems ni spangs par 'gyur/ de tshe thugs rje chen po yis//
gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor nas// rnam 'tshe nyes dmigs bshad bstan pas// rnam 'tshasams ni spangs par 'gyur// de tshe thugs rje chenapo yis// lha ma yin gyis
ts+tsA yongs bskor sa// 'thab pa'i nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// bzod pa bsgom pa'ibasngags pa brjod// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// nam mkha' lding gis yongs bskor nas/
'gal byas nyes dmigs bshad bstan te// 'dumapa'i sems kyis bsngags pa mdzad// de tshe thugasarje chen po yis// dri za'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// dga' ba'i tshigani
dpagamed kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags brjod bstan// de tshe thugs rje chen po yis// lto 'phye 'khor gyis yongs bskor nas// mu stags chos lasod mdzad cing//
