ngang rnamadzes dang g.yo sgyung rgyal dang// ngo tshamad dang khrolamed dang/ khangs dang phun tshogs nga rgyal dang// bag med 'dod chags de bzhineno/ dathugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan
nas/ rnasams can gang zhigasams dang yid// dman par gyur pa de dag la// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'du shes bstan// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas//
sems can gang zhig rang zhum zhing// rtsol bar ma byedade dag la// brtson 'grus stobs ni ston par mdzad// thugs rje chen pos 'phrul bstan nas// sems can gang zhig nor rnams
la chags par gyur ba de dag la// chog shes tshes ni stonapar mdzad// gzhan yang sngos kyi dri gtsang khang// me tog dag gi gzhalamad khang// khad pa brtsagasam mchog sprul
nas 3sprul pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs par bstan// gzhan yang lha yi bu mo rnams // me tog tsamapa'i khang pan// gnasapa lus phyed bstan sprul nas// ma tog 'phreng thogs
mchod byed bstan/ gzhan yang lha min bu mo dag/ mi rtogam li'i khang pan// gnas pa laaphyed bstan sprulanas// me tog 'phreng thogs mechod byed bstan// gzhan yang lha
'burnamasangag/ pad+masngonapo'i 'od pa na// gas b.lus phyadabastan sprul nas// sangs rgyas yon tanabasngags pa bstan// gzhan yang tshangs pa rnams kyi lha// gson gyi gzhalamed khang/
ban/ gnas pa lus kun bstan sprulas// sgrasnyanasangs rgyas bsngagos babastan// gzhan yang lha yobumo dag/ Atsho kas rgyanagyis lus bargyan cing// rgyan ni phan tshun reg pa las//
sgra snyanagu ba byung nas// 'dus byas rnamasakyichos ga// 'gyur zhimabartan yin na yang// byis pa mi bden rtogs pa yis// yang dag ji bzhin mashesazer// rgyan gyi sgra de dag kyang//
lus dngasams las byung ma yin// 'gro bamed cing 'ong bamang// phyogs kyad yod pa ma yin te// gzugs dang somasakyi bar du yang// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// byis pa rnams
kyis misams pas// 'di la the tshom skye bar 'gyur// rgyan gyi rnamapa de dag las// sgra snyan byung ba de yis// sangs rgyas zhing kun grags pasan// sems can tshad mad grol
ba'agyur// de lta bsan khyed rnamasakyis// 'dren pa'i rang byud yabashes dang// yon tan dpagamed sku dag ni// srid pa'i spros las 'das pa dang// rab dban skyon nimid pa dang//
ltakhrul sems rab sbyangs dang// mtshan dang dpe byad brgyan pa dang// sku dang thugs ni deg par ltos// khyed kyis bcom ldan grong gshegasatsha// gom pa dganasod ge 'dra// gag
stangs dang pa glang chen 'od// sems can re bskong bar mdzad// bsod nams khyad 'phagasayongs su rdzogs// yang dgamtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// semasacan dag ni thams cad
pas 3sems can dag mang po rnams // bskal pa brgya stong mang por ni// mya ngan 'das pa 'thob bar du// rnam smin thug pamad bar ltos// khyed kyis rkang
gnyis gtso mchogani// zag med tshul khrims rdzogs bsan// sems can dag nimang bo rnams // gus bas spyi bos phyag byed dang// lha yi 'khor ni mang bo rnams // sosor gzhal
mad khad spangs nas// rtse bdag la chags ma da bar// 'dren pa la ston byed ltos// khyedakyis bdud dang bdud kyi 'a'o// bcom ldan 'das la dad bskyed nas// gser gyi rlung
yab dag thogs te// g.yas g.yon du ni 'khod pa dang/ bdud kyi bu ni lnga brgya yis (lha ya mi rtog yid 'ong bas// de bzhin gshegs la mngon gtor nas// bla med ye shes
tshol la ltos// 'dus pa'isangs rgyas rnams lani// bsngags pabarjod cing mchod pasan// deng ci bcom ldan phrad gyur nas// so sor dga' bar gyur pa yin// spobs pa dgun
tsa tshad med kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'ibasngags pa brjod// de yi tshe na bdud kyi bu/ srad ba spangs pa zhes bya ba// klogomar bcom ldan bsngags brjod nas// mig zad mtha' neshes
par gyur// mig gi skya mtha'ashes pasan// rab zhimtshan nyid rab tu rtogs// gzhan yang mig zad lasogs pa'i// ming don tshegan dpag med rtogs// des na tshigamakhas dag gis
[uz]gi sems can rnams la yod dgu bstan/ ming dang don rnams la yang ni// zhen dang the tshom med bsan// 'gro 'ong med par rab rtogs shing// blang dor med pa nyid du gyur// rang
bzhin dgan stong dben pas// yi ge rnamasan spungs ba dang// len dang gzung dang klog pa dang// kha ton 'don cing sgrub byed rtogs// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegasab rnams //
sngon yang rab tu phye ste bstan// btags pa'i ming tsam yin pasan// yang dag brjod du ci yang med// rang bzhin stong ba de dag ni// phung po khams dang skyamached 'das// brdzun pa
mdatsang bden pa'ang yod// gnas dang gnas pa yod pamin// tshig gis ba'i lam chad cing// sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu zhi// skya bo'i mtshanam zhon pa'i phyir// bcom ldan
grong khyer gshegs pa mthong// bcom ldan mtshanam yosasngangs kyang// byis pa yang dag ma yin rtogs// bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// gang zhig dga' ba/
'gyur ba// de ni mtshan mar rtog pa ste/ myu ngan gdung dang bcas par 'gyur// gang zhig mtshan ma'i rtog sa sapa// grong khyer gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur/ gshegasashing
bskyod pa'imtshanam la// rnam rtog med pa'i shes rab 'thob// gang gis mtshanamasangs rgyasamachod// desanagrong khyer gshigs ba mthong// skye zhing 'khor ba'i chos dag la//
[@]// rnam par rtog pa skyod par byed// gang gis sangs rgyas mtshan mar mthong// dga' ba dganas 'gyur ba// de nibadud kyi spyod lags// bdud kyi sprod yul
snang ba yin// gang gis sangs rgyas mtshanamar mthong// de ni 'gyur ba mthong ba yin// de na mya ngan gdungs bcas pas// mkhas pas snying brtsar bya ba yin// chos la thob par
wA gang lta ba// de lachos skoramya ngan yod// sangs rgyas mthong ba skyes pa la// mya ngan 'das pa'i sdug bsngal yod// bskal pa mang bor gang bsgom pa// mtshanam thams cad
rtogs pasan// grong khyer gshigs par mirtog cing// myang n 'da' ba'i 'du shes med// sems kyi mtshan nyid stong rtogs pa// sangs rgyasaspyod la gnas pas na/ grod
yaM khyer gshegs par ma rtog cung// mya ngan 'da' ba'i 'du shes med// gang gis de ltar rab shes pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong 'gyur zhing// ngo bo nyid kyang stong rtogs pa//
mthar n skye 'gag cayadamed// bcom ldan bskal ba dbag med nas// dka' ba rnamasan rab spyad nas// ngo bo nyid ni stongamakhyen no// byis pa rnams kyisamartogs so//
bcom ldan grong khyer gshegs pa'i tshe// 'khor ni brgya stong mang gis bskor// mi dang mam yin la sogs// dang ba'i sems kyis mchod pabs// gang gis skad cig tsam dun//
mig zad mtha'ani rab sams shing/ mtshan ma rnams ni stod rtogs na// 'di yabasod nams de bas 'phags// bgrang ba dang ni gras kyi cha// rgyu tsam du yang ma'athod do// de
bzhin mig gi mtha' dang// mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// rab tu zhi ba'i bar du yang// de bzhin du ni rig par bya// rna ba sna lce lus dang yidi// gzugs sgra dra'i 'og/
bya nas// sgra dang ming gi bar du yang// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de nas de tshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du na ga shugasapa'i tshe// zhabasanasalareg tsam gyis//
ba ni kun tu reb tu g.yos/ ra rnams gang yin de dag kyang// thams cad bcom ldan 'das la phyogs// lha dang mni tshosakyi phyir// thams cad 'od s nas gus mchod byas//
de nasadetshe bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshigs pa'i tshe// lha yi dbang po mi yiskyal// lha ma yinan mod po dang// gnod sbyin dka na mang po rnams // rang gi grong
khyer sbasanasani// bcom ldan spyan sngar 'dus gyur te// rab tu dga' bsamachod pa byas// de nas de tsho bcom ldan 'das// grong khyon du nagashegs pa'i tshe// gzhan la nga
rnam ba tha dad pa'i// bya yitshogs ni tshod med pa// ne tso dang na rma bya dang// ka labadakabya ya rnams // bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ yon tan mchog ni mthong bsan//
thams cad namamakha'adag la ni// rab tu dga' bsarnam par rtse// thamasacad rnam pasnatshogs kyi// sgrasnyan dgun rab tu phyung// de nas de tshabcoman
'das// klong khya'adunagashegs pa'atsho// bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan dang// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni stobs dag gis// soms can dmadabang stod stod// mdongs ba dga'i
mthong bar gyur// 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur// dbang bom tshang gang yin pa// thams cad dbang po tshang bar gyur// sdug bsngal la na gnas ba dag/ thams cad bde ba kho
bar gyur// denas de tsho bcom ldan 'das// grong khyoradun gshegs pa'i tshe// namamakha 'bar snang dag las ni// 'od skad skya ba khros par gyur// gang gis mtshanam
rnamasakyis ni// de bzhin gshegs pa rtog byed pa// de yisabcom ldan 'das lani// mchod pa bya zhes brjod mi bya// mgo 'dematha' yi ngobo nyid// rtogs bar yang ni mi
'gyura'o// mtshan marnamasanigangaspungs pa/ yon tanagazhinabasags pasan// mig zad mtha' yi ngo bo nyidi// rab tu rtogs par yang 'gyur 'o/ 'di ltar mig ni zad pa'i
mtha'// rab tu rtogasab gyurapa'a'i// sangs rgyasarnamasakyi yon tan yang/ rtag turtogs par bod du chud/ mig ni zad pa'amatha' dag la// mi 'dzinasAd ba med pa dang/
cha gang zhig migag rab dben de dag la// rtag tu rmongs shing khodadum chud pa// de ni skya bo'i spyod par lhung bsan// des nimadosde 'di la mos mi 'gyur// gang zhigamagag rab dban
de dag la// rtag par khong du chud cing rmongasamed pa// de ni skyo bo'i spyod dang bralabasan// sani mdo sde 'di lamos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig gi 'gro 'ong med pal// rtag tu
rmongs shing khong du ma chud pa// den bo'ispyod par lhung bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos ma 'gyur// gang zhigamag gi 'gro 'ong med pa dag/ rtag par khong du chud cing rmongs
med pa// de ni skya bo'i spyod dang bral bas na// des nimado sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdagamedam rtogs nas// mig zad ngo ba di la rtag rmo ngas pa// de ni
skya bo spyod par lhung bsan// sanamado sde 'di la mosami 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med rab rtogasanas// mig zad ngo bo rtagatu rtogs gyur pas// dan skyabo'i spyod dad
bral bas na// des ni mdo sde 'di la mos par 'gyur// gang zhig mig la bdag med ma rtogs nas// bzod pa'i gnas la rtag tu rmos gyur ba// denaskya bo'i spyod bar lhung bas
na: dades ni mdo sde 'di la mosam 'gyur// gang zhig mig labadag med rab rtogasanas// bzod pa'i gnasan rtag tu rtogs gyur pa// de niskye bo'i spyod dang bral bas na//
mig zad mtha' na gang yin pa// yang dag jibazhin rtogs pa'i phyir// las kyi bye brag bla dad ba// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ dalasakyi bye brag tha
dad pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'aphyir// des na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig skyi mtha' na gang yin// yang dag jib zhin rtogs
pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal bye brag tha dad pa// de yang 'ab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sdug bsngal bye brug tha dad pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gdags
pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi 'jig pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs
par 'gyur// sdug bsngal 'jig pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur ba'i phyir// dus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthongab nyid du 'gyur ba yin// mig gi med
pagang yin pa// yong dag jibazhin rtogs pa'i phyir// mtshanamaspangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// mtshanamasngas bgang yinob// kha tu rtogs par
gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthong btid du 'gyur ba ye/ mig skye med gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// bag tshagasaspangs pa
gang yin pa// de yad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// bag chags sbas pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i ni// des na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin//
gzhan yang mag gi mi rtog nyid// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// sgrib pasngangs pa gang yin pa// de yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// sgrib paspras pa gang yin pa// btu rtogs
bar gyur pa'i phyir// des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang tshig la yi gamad// yang dag bzhi'i rtogs pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas ye
shesastobs dag kyang// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas ye shes stobs dag ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pa'i phyir// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid
du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang mgag ma 'ong nyid// yang dgardzibazhin rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod rnams spangs bgang yin pa// de yang rab rtogs par 'gyur// 'dod rnams sbyangs
ba gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur ba'aphyo'o// desanadi bzhinagashegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gzhan yang bsam gtan bsgom pa dag ga yang dag ji
bzhin rtogs pa'i phyir// nyon mongasasngangs pa gang yin pa// de yad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// nyon mongasasngangs pa gang yin pa// rab tu rtogasabar gyur pa'i phyir// des na de bzhin
@#// gshegs pa rnams // mthong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// gang zag des de bzhin du// mig ni sngon mtha' shes pa dang// mig gi mganas shes pa dang//
mig mi skya ba'ashes pa dang// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul shes pa dang// mig gi dman pa shes pa dang// mig ni khyad par 'phags shes dang// ye shes dmanapa shes padang// rnam dag
ye shes shes pa dang// tshul khrims rnam dgashes pa dang// lus kyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang// rnam dag sgra yapeshis pa dang// ngagagisdom pa'i shes pa dang// rnam dag sems kyi
zhes pa dang// gnasakyi bye brag shesapa dang// sems kyi chos kyi shes pa dang// sems skyon shes pa'i shes pa dang// rnam dag las kyangeshes pa dang// semasakyi sdom pa'i shes pa dang/
nyes dmigasashes pa'i shis pa dang// rnam dag sgra yareshes pa dang
phung po bya brag shes pa dang// phung po rgyu rkyen shes pa dang// mgani yongs shes shes ba dang// sdug bsngal
'byud gnas shes pa dang// zagamed tshul khrims shes pa dang// tshul khrims rgyu rkyen shes pa dang// sdug bsngal rgyu rkyen shes pa dang// sdug bsngal zad pa'i rgyu shes dang// 'dus
[Yid/]mod pa'angesapa dang// mtshanam bcas dngamtshanamamed// 'dus byas dang ni 'dusamabyas/ rnam par gzhag dang yos sdud dang// bdag dang gzhan gyi sams shes pa// yang dag
ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yadamigaThad skyamatha' dang// 'gag mtha'adang rab dban dang// 'jug pa dang ni yod pa dang/ mi skya ba dang nyer zhi nyid// yang dag ji bzhin shes pas
na/ 3sems can dgamad po rnams // rnam par dag pa'i yashes dang// mthu dang bcas pa'i ye shes dang// brtson 'grus ye shes 'thob par byed// gzhan yang gcig
dang tha dad shes// sems can dag ni thams cad kyi// mos pa'ashes pa gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/ gzhan yang sams can thams cad kyi// mos pa khyad
bar 'phags pa dang// rnam dag sams kyi shes pa dang// las dang rnam smin shes pa dang// dbang po khams kyi shes pa dang// semasan 'gyur ba shes pa dang// shes rab mos pa'i
shes pa dang// shin tu rnamagrol shes pa dang// spobasamchog gi nangeshes pa dag/ yang dag rdzibazhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang semasacan ma rus dang// chos la mos pamed gyur pa//
yang dag ji bzhin shes pasan// mos pa'i shes pa skyed par byed//gzhan yang don gyi tshul dag ni// yang dag ji bzhin shes pasan/ le lo med pa'i shes pa dag/ dus shesasgrub par byed
[p]// pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobs ngag gis// chos rnams rab tu 'byed pa dang// thogs pa mad pa'i yashes dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin/
gzhan yang rgya chen don dag dang// tshig gi bstan pa gang yin pa// rjes su shes pa'i shes pag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang grogs bzang 'thun gnas dang// gos
lhadang zas dang btung ba dag/ tshod 'dzin pa yishis pa rnams // yang ngag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang bya bamed pa yi// gzungasakyi chosan gang yin pa// nan tan bsgrub pa'i
gnyis pa dag/ yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang lus sems skyon med cing// sgro 'dogs skur 'debs yongs spangs nas// bla med ye shes gang tshol ba/ yang dag
ji bzhin shes pa yin// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul stobasangag gis// namamakha' bar snang dag las ni// sprul pa'i sku ni re ba bstananas// sems can dag na brgya stong snyad/ yos
susmin par mdzad pasan// thams cad rab tu dgar gyur nas dang bskyas pa'i shes pa dang// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang/ mosashing gus pa'i shis pa dang// 'dod
chags sngangs pa'i chos dag dang// rab mos bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshogs la yang// mchod par mos pa'i shes pa dang// byang chub chen po dag la yang/
rab mos bsdo ba'i shes pa dang/ gzungs rnams kyin sgo dag la// rab mos ston pa'ishes ba dang/ mos pa rnams ni gang yin pa// sosor rab rtogs shes pa dang// 'phags pa'i/
ting 'dzin gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shes pa dang// bsrung dang rjes su dran rnams la// ngesapar 'byed pa'i shes pa dang// dpag tu med pa'i sems dgu la// legs par
'jug pa'i shes pa dang// tshegasasu bcad patshad med rnams // yang dag ston pa'ishesapa dang// 'dod pa'imatshams sbyor gang yin pa// rtogs shing go ba'i shes pa dang// 'gro bdaman
pa de dag tu// ltung bar mi 'gyur shes pa dang// ma dge bshes gnyenagang yin pa// yosasu spong byed shes pa dang// dge ba'ibasagatan gang yin pa// ston par byed pa'i shes pa
dang/ rta'adrazhing lan ldon gang yin pa// rab tu rnam 'byed shes pa dang// gnas dang gnas min gang yin pa// legs par rtogs pa'i shis pa dang/ sa dngasamin gang yin pa/ legs
par rtogs pa'i shis pa dang// rab 'bring tha ma gang yin pa// rnam par 'byed pa'i shis ba dang// 'dus byas shes ba gang yin pa// 'dusam byas kyishes pa dang// dngos po dang nardzas kyi
shes// dngos dang dngosaminashesapa dang// yongasasu sdud byed shes pa dang// yongasasu sdudamigs pa dang// mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes pa dang// yang dag bsgrub min shes pa dang// mag
dang migamin shes ba dang// mig dang lhan cig shes ba dang/ mig gi bye bragashes pa dang// mig gi rang bzhin shes pa dang// yang dag ji bzhin shes pa yin//
rnabasna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming la sogasaba'i bar// chosan rnam bzhi'u lnga// thamasacad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/ gang zhigamag gi rgyu rkyen nyid// yang dag stong zhing dben pa dang/
mthar ni bdag yod ma yin par/) sems par byed pa gang yin pa/ )gang zag deni di bzhin du// yang dag nges ba kho nar ni// sems kyi ting 'dzin gang yin pa// yongs su rdzogasapa
byed par 'gyur// gang zhig ma gan rten 'bral dang// migami rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dag/ nges pa nyid du rtogs gyur nas/ sams bar byed pa gang yin pa// gang zag des ni de bzhin du//
mgagi rgyu rkyen gang yin ngang// mthar ni yod pa ma yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rtogs par 'gyur// rna ba sna lce lus dang yadi/ sgra dang ming la sogs pa'ibar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga//
thums cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yatshon bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du ni gshegs pa'atsho/ zhabasanas la regatsam gyis// dngos po ngomatshar rab bstan pa// deng 'dir bdag
ny+nyo gas mdor bsdus nasaM// yon tan phyogasani cud zad cag/ semasacan dga' bskyod pa'i phyir// yang dag pa ni bstan par bya// de tshe lhamana'adren pa yis/ spu yi khung bu gcigs
0 ni// 'od zer brgya stong tshad med snyad/ rab tu bkye bar gyur bsan// 'od zer dag ni re res kyang// zhing ni tshad med gsal mdzad nas// sems can mang po kun gyi phyir// sangs
rgyasamadzad pa rab tu mdzad// gang zhig 'das pa'i dusasun// sangs rgyasams lamachod pa dang// yun ring sbyin dang tshul khrims dag/ mngon par bsgrubasapa gang yin pa// dak+Sha
bu yi gang zag dag/ desani ji skad bstan payi// rdzu 'phrul dngosapo thos gyur na// rab tu dga' zhing mos par 'gyur// gang zhigasangs rgyas rdzu 'phrula rnams // tan thos dang ni
rang rgyal gyis// spyod yulaman bar rab shes nas/ de lta bu yi gang zag dag/ desan joskad bskadu pa yis// rdzu 'phrul dgan thos rgyusan// mos pa dganaskya 'gyur zhing//
ngo mtshar 'dzin pa'i sems kyang skyed// lha dang mni 'dren ba yis// bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dag gis// de lta bu lasogs ba yi// rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rab bstan bas// sems can
dag ni brgya stong dang// tshad med grangs med brnamasakyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la// brten nyid mi gro mchod pa byas// lha dang mi ni 'dren pa yis// bsam gyis mi khyab
mthu dag giso// mdo sde dag ni brgya stong dang// tshad med grangasamed rab bshad pas// semasacan dganamang po rnams // bstan pa de ni thos pasan// thams cad dang bas rab bladu
te// sams ni btudaga' bar gyur// de yi tshon bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du nagashegs pa'i tshe// rdzu 'phrul gyi namathu dgagis/ namamakha' las 'di
skad du// mig zad mtha'anangashes pa nas// migana'i bar zhi ba dang/ dmig da rgyuyi bar du yang// 'gro bamed cing 'ongamed dang// mthu'ani stong dbenA shes par gyis// de skad du ni thosapar
wAgyur/ darna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang mang lasogs pa'ibar// chos ni rnam ba ki shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// de yi bcom ldan 'das// grong khyer du nagashegs
pa'i tshe// nam mkha' bar snang ga lasanaM// sgra snyan dam pa mchogabyung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sna tshogs/ bsngags pabarjod par gyur pasan// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen po
dkaM/ rnams // thams cad dad mosasams kyang skyes// da ltar 'jig ston bzhugs pa yi// mi yising ga gang yin pa// mtshan ni bdud dang bdud dpung dag/ phamamadzod chos kyi rgyal zhes
bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dga'// log par ltaba'i tshogasakrams cad/ rab tu 'dulabar nus zhes zer/ da ltar 'ag chen bzhugs pa yi// mi yi se da ga gang
yin pa// mtshanani 'dodachags gzhom pa dang// zhi mdzadachos kyi lazhisabya// gang gis 'di ltabu yi mtshan// thosapa'i gyur ba de dag ni// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa// thams cad
srong bar 'gyur zhes ma// da ltar 'jig na bzhugs ba yi// mi yisadagegang yin pa/ mtshanan zhe sdangagazhom pa dang// zhimadzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos
par gyur pa de dgagi/ zhe sdang dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ga gang yin pa// mtshanan gti mug gzhom pa dang//
zhimadzad chos kyi rgyal zhes// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag// gti mug dgan gang yin pa// thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rtan bzhugs pa
yi 3mi yi seng ge gang yin pa/ mtshanani rgyal gzhom pa dang// zhimadzad chos kyi rgyal zhes// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag ni// nga rgyal dgan gang yin pa//
thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yising ge gang yin pa/ mtshanani khong khrogazhom pa dang// zhi mdzadu chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta
bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur ba de dag ni// khong khro dgagang yin pa// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhesazeg/ da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs ba yi// mi yisang ge gang yin pa// mtshanani phrag dog
gzhom pa dang// zhimadzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yamtshan// thosapar gyur ba de dag ni// khrag dog dag ni gang yin pa// thams cad spong bar gyur zhes zer// da ltar
'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ge gang yin pa// mtshanani/bden gzhom pa dang// zhimadzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yemtshan// thos par gyur/
pa de dgagi/ ma bden ngagazhi gang yin ba// thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ge gang yin pa// mtshanani lha rnamasagazhom pa dang// zhimadzod
chos kyi rgyu la zhes bya// gang gis 'di ltabu yamtshan/ thos par gyur pa de dag ni// lta ba dgan gang yin pa// thams cad sprodabar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jigarten bzhugs pa yi// mi
yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshanan spros pa gzhom pa dang// zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal zhes bya/ gang gis 'di lta bu yamtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag/ ]/sprosapa dag ni gang yin pa// thams
cad sdod par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa// ma yasong gesrung yin pa// mtshan ni yang dag pa yi chos// rnam dag chos kyi rgyal zhesabya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/
blos 'gyur ba de dag// rnam dag chosanagang yin ga/ rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhesazen// da ltar 'jig rtan bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni las rnams gas pa yi/tshes
kyirgyal zhesabya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yamtshan// thos par gyur pa de dab/ni// lasa rnams thamasacad gang yin pa// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi//
mi yisang ge gang yin ba// mtshan ni rdzu 'phrulaphun tshogs pa'i/ chos kyi rgyal zhes bya ba yi// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur ba de dag/rdzu 'phrul yon tanagang yin pa// yongasasu
rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da lta'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// ma lasong ge gang yin pa// mtshanan pha rol phyin pa rnams // phun tshogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan//
thos par gyur pa de dag ni// pha rol phyin drug gang yanib// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// de ltar 'jig rtan bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang gegang yin pa/ mtshan ni 'du byed
gang yin pa// rab rtogs chos kyi rgyal zhes bya// gangagis 'di lta bu yamtshan// 'dzin par byedupa de dag ni// 'du byed dag thams cad kun// rab tu rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// nga lta'o
'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ge gang yin pa// mtshan ni rnam par dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin bskyod cis// gang gis 'di lta bu yimtshan// thos par gyur pa de ngag ni// khyad
bar 'phagasaba'i len dag/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer/ da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisodage gang yin pa/ mtshanan khe dog dgo pagi/ 'od zer kun 'dzin zhus kyang
bya3 gdagis 'di lta bu yimtshan/ thos par gyur ba de dag ni// khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dam par// yongasasu rdzogasapar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rtenabazhugs b yi// mi yisong
ge gang yin pa// mtshanasku nyid dag pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag/ khyad par 'phags pa'i/
gzugs sku dag/ yosasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jigarten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisang ge gang yinag/ mtshanan gdung nyid dag pa gi/ 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya//
gang gis 'dalta bu yimtshan// thos par gyur pa de dag// khyad par 'phag pa'i a rigs rnams // yongasasu rdzogasapar 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng
gagang yin pa// mtshan ni rgya cher grags pa yi// 'od zer kun 'dzin zhes kyang bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// thos par gyur pa de dugani// rgya cher grags pa'i grogs pa rnams // yosasu/
rdzogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rtan bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshanan sbyin pa gtodab dang/ tshul khrims can dad bzod snyom dang// brtson 'grus brtsams/
dang bsam gtan dang// shesarab kun 'dzin zhesakyadabya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi'atshan// thos par gyur pa de dgun/ sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims nas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang//
gzungasakyi sgo ni gang yin pa// yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur zhes la// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yi seng ge gang yin pa// mtshanani stong pa nyid rdzogs pa'i// chos kyi rje zhes bya
ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yimtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni// chos rnams stong pa'i don dag kyang// yang dag rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// da ltar 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi// mi yisangag
gang yin pa// mtshanani bdag med rdzogs pa yi// chos kyi rje zhes bya ba yin// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan// 'dzin par byed pa de dag// skye 'gag med don gang yon pa// yang dag ston par
'gyur zhes zer/ da ltar 'ag na bzhugs b yi// mi yi sang ge gang yin pa// mtshan nilwan tid dag bayi// kun 'dzani chos kyi rje zhes bya// gang gis 'di lta bu yi mtshan/ 'dzin par byed/
ba de dag ni// mag 'damatha' don gang yin pa// yang dag ston par 'gyur zhes ze ra// rna ba sna lce lus dad yod// sgra dang ming la sogs ba'i bar// chos ni nyi shu rtsa lnga dang// me tog 'thung ba
spos dag dang// mar ma bdug dngagos rnamasakyang// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya/// bamapo lnga pas thama'o// de yitshe na bcom ldan 'das//
grong khyer du nag shegs pa'i tshe// bsam gyisam khyab pa ga gi/ rdzu 'phrul rgyan stobs rnams kyis// nam mkha' bar snang dag las// sa skyon dam pa ribabyung ste// gzusakyi spyod
pa sna tshogs dag/ yang dag par n stan pasan// 'khor ni 'dus pa chen bo rnams // 'di lta bu yitshig thos te/ gzungs gang yin 'di dgags/ migagi zad mtha'ogang yin dang// skyematha'
bya@#// dang ni mtha' rnams dang/ rab dben dang 'jug bas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar rnams kyi// chos rnams gang yin de dag gi/ mthar phyinanasani gang yin pa// thams cad/
rab tu rtogs par byed// sbyin pa'i stobs ni gang dag gis// mthar na gang dag sdud pa dang// tshul khrims stobasani gang dag gis// mthar nagang dag 'grub pa dang// bzod pa'i stobs ni gang
dag gis// ma thar ni gang dag bkod pa dang// brtson 'grusastobasani gang dag gis// mthar ni gong dgasong ba dang// bsam gtan stobs ni gang dag gis// mtha'/gang dag sgomapa dang//
shes rab stobasani gang dag gis// mthar nagang dag ston ba dang// ye ge rnams dang brjod pa dang// sgra skad rnams ni spangs pas// gzugs dang sems kyibar du yang// mtha'ani rnam dag
sgo/ nyid du rtogs// zag dang bcas dang zagamed dang// don rnams dang rnaphen pa dag/ thams cad stong zhing dben pa dang// mthar ni rnam dag tud du rtogs// srid pa dgan thams cad la// na
tsang gnas b.ram byed dang// gzungs dang ting 'dzin dag la ni// rab pudaben par gnas par byed// 'gro bamed cing 'ongamed dang// dgeb ma yin migamin// lung du maston payang min//
ny+nyo/ bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i de lta bu yimtshan ma rnams // thams cad yongs su dag pasan// dbang phyug yon tan dag la yang// gnas par yang nim byed do// nyan thos dang ni sdu

ngag ni gang yin pa// thams cad posasu zhi 'byed/ skye ba dang mis dang// sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba dang// bstod pa dang nas+sad pa dang// thams cad yongasasu spong zhes zer// mthar
phyin snang ba gang yin dang// stod pa'i gzungasani gang yin pa// thams cad rab tu gang rtogs pa// 'di nyidasangs rgyasaspyod yul la// rab tu gnas par byed pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas rol/
pa yi// gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin// 'di nyid sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// 'ditidasas rgyas mkhyen pa la// rab tu gnas par gyur pa yin// tshig bod
mtha' yistobs dag ga/ de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang// mig skya mtha' yastobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pa dang// mig gi mtha' yi stobs dag la// de bzhin du ni gnas pas// nye bar
zhi ba'i stobasakyi bar// de la rab gnas pa dang// rnab sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming lasogs pa'ibar// chos ni rnam pa ni shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// gzusazhigang
yin 'di dgags// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs// khyad par 'phags pagang yin pa// yongasasu rdzogs par byed ces zer// gzungasani gang yin 'dig gis// gzi byin mthusnyokas
de lta bu // yongs su rdzogs par byas nasani// de bzhin gshegasabathams cad kyi/ gnas kun la ni'ajug pa dang// de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi// spyod yul
kun la gnas gyur pas// 'jig rten pa ni thams cad kun// lham yazhigyatshogs dag la// brtan par 'dzin pa'isamasakrangs nas// tshangs pa'i spyod la gnas par byed// gnod sbyin brgya stong
tshad med dang// grul bum dgun tshad med rnams // de dag thams cad kun kyani// rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed// driza'i 'khor ni gang yin dang// srin po'i 'khor nigang yin pa// tshadamid gros
medade dag kyang// rab tu dul la dga' bar byed// gal te tshangs pa'i 'khor rnamasakyis// sgra snyan dganadam pa yis// tshig dang don ni rjod byed kyang// yang dag bstan pa yinus te/ sems
las byung ba'i chos rnamasakyis// dbag par bya ba ma yin dang// sems las byung ba'itshosarnamasakyis// gzung bar bya min zhes zer// gzungasani gang yin 'di dgun// mig gis dmigs
! par bya bamin// gzua ni gang yin 'di dgan// lus kyi bar gyis dmigasabya min// gzungs/gad yun 'di degan/ mig cha songamigs par byakhamane// mig gi spyod yulakhar gyis kyang//
dmigs pakhyab ma yin te// rna bsna lce lus nasan// sgra dang ming lasogs pa'aphir// chos ni rnam pa de reshulnga// thams cad de bzhinasbyar zhes zer// gzhan yang mig gi zad mtha' dang//
mig mas kyi ni[”]mtha' dang/ mig gi mtha' dang 'jug pa nas// nye bar zhiba'i bar dag la// bdag dang skyes bu med pa dang// sams can dang ni srog med dang// de bzhin gang zag med
ba dang/ mtshan mamed cid byedamod dang// 'gro ba med cing 'ong med dang// 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mtshan// thams cad rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos nyid
kyi// mag ni rtogs par 'gyur zhes zer// gzhan yang 'di skad chos rnams lags// grub pa'amiganagod yin pa// yogs mig dang shesarab mig/ tshangs pa'i mig ngang lha
yi mig/ tshangs bar skyes nas klobamig dang/ lharan sbyas nas thobayig dang// tshangs pa'i rnamasminamage dag dang// lha yi rnamasminamag dag dang// tshangs pa'i rgyu lasany+tsasamag
dang/ lha yi rgyu las skyes mig dang// lha yi rdzu 'phrulamage dag dang// lha yi brtson 'grus dag gi mig/ dman par skyes pa'i mig dag dang/ khyad 'phags skyes pa'i mig dag
dang dgashin rje'i 'jig rtenagang yin pa// yosasu spangs pa'amig dag dang// klu dang gnod sbyin mig dag dang// grul bum gyi ni mge ngag dang// yongasasu gdung bcas mig dag
dang/ yongs su gdung man mig dag dang// rnam par dag ba'i mgon dang// rnam par ga man mig dag dang// mdun ring zhing chungamig dag dad// nyan thos theg pa la yi mi ka/ bsam
gtan pa yamig dag dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi mig dag dang// spyod yulalas byung mig jag dang// 'du shes las byung meg dag dang// 'dod chags las byung mig dag
dang// 'dodachags bral ba'i mig dag dang// rgyu las byung ba'i mige dag dang// rgyugan las byung mgi dag dang// mtshus par ldan ba'amog dag dang/ mtshungasapar ldan minamag dag
wA dang : d+hasgo brtan lasakhyung mig dkadang// sgo las byung mnamag dag dang// rgyu rkyenolas byungamig dgadang// rgyu sgo las skyes mig dag dang// sha las grub mne mig dag dang// ye
shasarnam par dgamago dang// yod pa min pa'i mig dag dang// dmigs mdamigani gang yin pa// thams cad rtogs par byed ces zer// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// sgra dang ming lasogs
lho pa'i bar// chos ni rnam pa nyi shu lnga// thams cad de bzhin sbyar zhes zer// de yi tshon bcom ldan 'das// namamakha' bar snang dag las ni// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa yi// sgra snyan dam ba
rgyu mchogabyung nas// khyad par 'phags pa gzungs kyi chos// 'di skadadu nibaka' stsalate// 'di yang de bzhin gshegasapa yis// rdzu 'phrul ngaganasprul pa yin// 'di lta ste/ sa le/ ma le

rnams gang yin 'di dganu/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu brnyes// mthu chen dag ni phun sum tshogs// shes rab dgatshod kyang med// 'dzin pa dag niyongs su spong// dran pa dgan
dag par byed// gzugs med 'gro dang 'ong bamed// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams yod pa min// mtshanam med cing brjod dang bral// spros pa dag las la nga dag 'das// byang chub sems
dbas sgrub byed na// mthar ni bsil ba 'thob bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrag/ brgya stong mang po dag gis ni// tshig gcig tsamani rab bstan kyang// mtha'ani dmigasabar yong ma
nus// 'phags pa mang pos rab tu bsngags// rnam par dag cing zhen pa med// 'khor 'dusand po thams cad kyis/ shin tu gus pa skyed par byed/ gzungasani gang yan 'di dag gis// dgaba'i
chos kyi mthu stobs kyis// nyon mongs rab bcom te zhanas// khyad 'phags phan yon thob pa'abyed// yon tan dang ni shes rab dag/ shin tu che rgya mtsho 'dra// bzod pa dag ni sgrub b.rabyed//
sams narab badagayo med 'gyur// byang chub sems dpas rtag tu bsgom// mkhas pa dag gis rab tu bsngags// dbul 'phongs dgun spong byed cing// sa dang rin chen/
'thob par byed// gzungs ni gang yin 'di dag gis// yon tana rnams nu 'phel bar byed// rtag tu stong nyid lasogs pa'i/ bden tshig dag gis rab tu brgyan// yi ge dag spangs pasan//
stong pa'i ngo bo'adi ces bya// sems dang rnam shes spras pasan// chos kyi ngo bo nyid cesabya// gzusani gang yin 'di dag gis// dri bral rtag tu rnam dag byed// yang dag yegs la
gnasanas// phan pa snatshogs ston par byed// sems can dag ni mang po rnams // dga' zhing dang bskyed par byed// gnod sbyin dganatshad med dang// grul bum 'bor ni gang yin pa// 'di la
sogasab yi dgasargyalag/ dga' ba chen po skyid ces zer// gzus sngags gang yin 'di dag// rab tu zhi zhing spros pa med// soms can dag la byams pasan// kun la bde basbyin pa byed//

bskal ba mang po brgya stong du// 'gro ba rnams su rtagakun sangashing// phan pa tshad med rab byed kyang// rnam par dag cing gos pamed// tshigs su bcad pa brgya stong gis// bdud rtsi'i chosan rab bstan
nas// sems can dga' tshod med rnams // dga' bachen po skyod par byed// sngon gyi sangs rgyasatshadamad rnams // shin tu rnam dgamos pa las// gzungs 'di la ni brten nasasu// rtag tu chos nyid/
rtogs par byed// tshangs dang brgya byin lha rnams dang// klu yi rgyal po lham yin// gzus 'di thos par gyur nas kyang// sems kyi dga' bskyedacesazer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag rnams // gang
du gnas pa'i yul de ni// rtag tuganod dang 'khrug pa dang// nad dang sdug bsngal mya nganamed// sems can gan thams cad kun// so sor dga' ba'asems bskyang nas// gzungs 'di rtag tu bdag
cag gis// sems la gnas par smon lam 'debs// gzungasasngags gang yin 'di dgan/ lus dang sems dang dkan dag dang// kha mchu dag la gnas gyuran// yon tan dpag med skyod pa'
byed gal te rtag tu 'dzin byed na// yon tan tshu dmed grob gyur nas// sems canamang la phan 'dogs gang// thams cad dag 'a ba thob ces zer// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag gis//
sdig pa rnams ni baspong zhing// dam chos dag niston byed pas// thug pa med pa'i sbobs pa thob// sems can ngaganabargya stong rnams // thertsom dag rab bsalanas// nga rgyal rnams ni rab
bcom ste// yon tan dpagamed 'khrob ces zer// shinatu zab cing gsang ba'i chos// gzungs gsagadayin 'di rigan/ mkhasangs rtag tu semasabyed cing// nan tanagyisani sgrub par byed//
shesarab go cha'ababagos nas// nyon mongs 'ab tu 'jom par byed// yon tan semasana'aphelabyedangs// rab tu mos shing skyo ba med// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dgagi/ grogasapa chen
po phun tshogs pas// zad pa dang ni mi zad dang// skye dang mi mtha' rab rtogs// 'di 'dra'i shesarab sna tshogasakyis// bdag tu de rab tubargyan pasan// de bzhin gsheg
pa brgya stong rnams // shin tu gus shing mchod pa mdzad// de 'dra'agazungs ni gang yin pa/ dge ba dag gi rkang gnyis byed// ting 'dzin mchog la ba gnasanas// byang chub lam la gzhol bar
'byed zhi gnas lhag mthong rjes 'brang zhing// bag med shes ba rtogs par byed// rab dad dbang po stobs kyis ni// lag gnyis yongasasub bar byed// brtson 'grusadadan bzod ba yis//
nu ma gnyis ni grub par byed// shes rab pha rol phyin pas// spyi gtsug mtshan nyid rab du byed// mdo sde drug gis skud byas nas// soser 'og bzhu 'phreng bar brgyus// sngon namangon par
bsgrubs pa yi// yon tan rnam pa snatshogs dang// dpe ni tshad med jisnyadapa// thams cad rab tu brgyan ces la// gzungs sngags gang yin 'di dag// yon tan tshad med phun tshogs bas//
mig gi sngon dang phyi mtha' dang/ zad dang ma 'damatha' dag dang/ skya ba dang mi skye dang// mtha' dadamatha'aman gang yin dang// dben pa dang mi deben dang// 'jug pa dang ni 'jug min dang//
ci yang med dang ma 'byung dang// nyer zhi dang ni bdag med dang// gang zagamed dang srogamed dang// soms can med pa'i bar dag dang// 'dilasogs pa'i tshad med sgo// thams cad rab du rtogs

gang yin pa// rab dben yon tanamchog ldan zhing/ sangs rgyasaspyod yul yin pas na// gzungs don yang dag gang yan pa// yi gas brjod bya ma yin yang// 'jig rten pa yi rjes sa yang/ kha
pa'i ming gis brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu zla 'od gzhon nu'i khyim du byon pa dang gdan bshams pa larab bzhugs so// de'i tshe
zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyidamachod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pa thogs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams la

stag go/ de ltar mchod ba phul pa'ang bdag 'ba' zhigagi phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can tshadamed pa thamasacad bla na med pa'i byang nub la gzhol zhing phan yon chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir mchod

mngon par sgrub par byedan/ yon tan khyada' du 'phags pa rnam pa brgyad cu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa brgyad nu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste sems can yongasasu smin par byed cing tshig
snyan pas yongasasu sdud par byed pa dang/ mtshan gya nomapa yongs su rdzogasapa dang/ dbod po rnamasamtshang ba med pa dang/ 'khor bsrangasanas mya ngan las 'das mngon du byed pa

ldan pa dang/ shes rab phun sum tshogs ba dang/ spyod pa khyad par du 'phags bamchog mngon par sgrub pa dang/ spyod pa bla na med cing mtshungs pamed ba yongs su rdzogs pa dad ! bag/
chags yang dgabar bcom nas de bzhin gshegasaba'i thanasacad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa 'phel bar byed pa dang/ sku dang ring bsrel 'jig rten thams cad dang/ tanathos dad/ 'di sangs rgyas
rnams kyis ma chod par 'gyur ba dang/ ma rungs pa rnams rab tu btul bas mi'i rgyalapo dad/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgya po dang/ tshangs
pa'i rgyalapo rnams yongasasu dang bskyabar 'gyur ba dang/ mthu chen po dang ldan ba dang mdo'i sde dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ lung du bstan pa dang ched du brjod pa dang/ dbyangs
kyis snyad ba dang/ rtogs pa brjod dang/ gleng gzhi dang de lta bu byung ba dang/ skyes pa'i bsadang/ shin turgyus pa dang/ rmad du byung ba dang gtan pa phab par bstan pa'i snga'i bar du len

rtenanamchog tu gyur cing ming dang gzugs yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ chos kyi sku mngon du byed par 'gyur ba dang/ mi 'jigs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ bsod nams phun sum
tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ musagasacan rnams zilakyisaganon pa dang/ skyes bu dam pa'i chos phunasumatshogasapa dang/ sdig pa can gyi spyod pa sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang )bsod nams dang ye
sa kyi rgyu la man bar yid ches pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos kyi sdums byed pa dang/ bdudumang bo pham par byed pa dang/ sasargyasakyis gsus pa'achos bdon pa dag la the tshom dang mnuramed
ba dang/ 'dod pa ngan pa rnamasarab tu bcom pa dang/ gzibyin chen po dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pas rdzu 'phrul khyad par du 'phags pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
dadad ! skya shaspong bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ spyod pa dpag tu med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ yon tan rnams 'os su sdud/ dang skyasha sar 'phyir
bar 'gyur ba dang soms can rnams la spro ba bskyed pa dang/ chos kyi dga' ba la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ sbyin pa padatong bamangon par bsgrub par 'gyur ba dang/ ye shes chen po'i sgor/

ma la3 phan yon mchog ni brgyad cu yod// ngas mdorab sdus bstan pa yin// gzhan yang dpagamed bsamadaka' yi// yon tan dag gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin pa lasany+tsaste// deng 'dir
cung zad bstan par bya// khyod kyis 'khor 'dusamang po'o// mnyam pa'isoms kyis gamachod pa/ sbyin pa tshogasanadi dag la// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya// sbyin ba 'di yis bsag
ba yi// bsod nams phung bo bsam mikhyab// mtshan dang dpe byad lus brgyan pa// thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sugs dang nas rags dang/ khul rnams dngan khyim dag dang//
grags pa dang nigazugs dang sems// thamasacad yongasasu dag bar 'gyur// lha rnams rdzu 'phrul dngos po dag/ gzhalamed khang dang lha mo dang// rnam dag thogasamang spobs pa yang// sbyin/
ba lasan byung ba yin// sbyin pa'i tshogasamchog gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di skad du// 'di ni dang por byang chub rnams / kungs pa'i gzhi zhes bsngags par mdzad// byang
chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// sbyin la the tshom med pa dag nges ba'i sems la 'bags nas// sbyin pa nan tan sgrub par gyis// sbyin pa'i sems gang dag gis// bsod nams
mchog ni rdzogs byedapa// byang chub sems dpas sgrubabyedan// sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur sbyin pa'i mthuyastobs kyis ni// rdzu 'phrul mchog ni rdzogasabyed pas/ 3zhing na bye ba
bsgul byas kyang// sems can rnams la gnod mi 'gyur// sbyin b btang ba'i dbang gis na// rnam dgotshul khrims mang thos dang// yang dag yid ches brtson 'grus dang// ting 'dzin zag
med shes rab 'dren// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gisan// dab da postobs dang yan lag dang// yang dagu0f00nga dad rdzu 'phrul rkang// bag chags song ba 'dren par byed// sbyin pa btang ba'i dbang gis
nan mag spyasnyan dag gis ni// zhing na bye ba brgya phrag tu/ dpagamed chos ston 'dren par byed// yongs su dang bas sbyin btang bas// rdzu 'phrul rnams ni yongs su

'thob ]/rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// nan tan sbyin pa btang bar gyis// lhamamang po tshad med rnams // lha ma yin dang klu rnams dang/ dkanod sbyin brgya stong mang po dang// 'khor rnamasakyis
ni yongs bskor nas// gzhal med khang mchog rab bzhugs te// rang dbang ngag gisartse byed pa// 'di lasogs pa'i rgyal po rnams // sbyin la brtson pa mthong gyur na// thams cad langs nas
'a bsu nas ni// stan btingamachod bdag kyang byed// sbyin gtong gang zag gang yin pa// gzi byinachen po phun tshogs shing// rdzu 'phrul stobs la dbang thob pas// lhargyal rnams ni sdud par
byed8 rtagrul bum dang ni gnod sbyin rnams // thams cad skyabs su 'grobar 'gyur// dri ze 'khor bcas rnams kyisakyang// rolamo dag gisamachod par byed// chom rkun dag gis byams
sems skyod// ma rungs pa rnams ring du 'gro// nor rnams nyams pa mi 'gyur te// bang mdzod dag nigang bar 'gyur// sbyin pa yongasasu btod pa'i phyir// tshogs mchog dag ni rdzogs par
'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes thug kha'adu// mu stegs chos ni spyod ma byed/de lan ba yongam da de// gzugs rnams longs su srung bar byed/ khyad par 'phags pa'i stobs rnamasakyang// sbyin pa/
las ni byung ba yin// de ltar sbyin pa gang gtong ba// byang chub lamanosgrub par byed// mdeg bshes gshenaphradama'agyur// spyod 'thun grogasapo 'thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang byang chub
sems dpa' rnams // sbyin pa'itshogasazhi sogs byed// bsamagyis mkhya ba gzungs dag dang// shes ba longs sulcogs byed pas// rigasasu bcad pa tshad med kyis// kun 'dzin yid
dag ston par byed// thams cad lan thogasamed pas// ngobatedi don storam 'gyur// byang chub sems ni re la/ mos pa'i sems nibartan par 'gyur// tshul khrims dag pa phun tshogs
shing/ 3bdud kyi las rnams spong bar byed// 'dod pa lnga la zhen med cing// rtse gcig yang dag dran patshol// sems la rtag tu rmongasamed bas)/ 'dod pa dag lasring miskyed:/ zhe sdang
nyon mongs gang yin pa// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu rtogs// spyod yul dag ni thams cad la// zhen pa med cing rmongs pamed// gang zag des na nyon mongs rnams // legs banyid du
rtogs par 'gyur// rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las// nyes dmigs rnams ni skyabanas/ sangs rgyasachos kyi bar dag gis// rgyu dang rgyu ya rgyu nyid dang// de bzhin rgyu yi bya ba rnams //
thamasacad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// desanamog zad mtha' yargyu// gang yin rab tu rtogs pas na// rmongs ba rnams ni yongasasdongasanos// mag lamangon par zhon mi 'gyur//
des namig ga mtha' dang// mtha' dang rab tu dben pa dang// 'jug pa dang yod pa dang// ma banasanyer zhi'i bar// 'di lasogs pa'i rgyu nyid
kyang 3/ rab tu rtogs bar gyur bsan// rmongs pa rnams yongs spangasanas// mig la mngon par zhenam 'gyur// desan mig gisngonamatha' yi// brjod pa 'jig rten rjes
sun// btags pa min pas de lan/ yang dag ru yang mdapar rtogs/ des mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod pa 'jig rtenarjes su ni/ btags pa yin pas de la ni//
mang dag ciyang med par rtogs// des ni mig gi skye mtha' dang// mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang// ci yang med dang skye mod nas// nye bar zhiba'i bar dag dang// 'di la
sogs pa'i brjod pa rnams // 'jig rten rjesasu btags pasan/ de la yang dgamad pa ni/ rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/ des na mig gi sngon mtha' ya/ brjod
ba rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas na// de la zhen bci yang med// des na mig gi khyimatha' ya// brjodab rgyu rkyen 'dus pa las// byung ba nyid du rtogs pas
lhan/ de la zhen pa tsa yeng med// des na mig gi skye mtha' dang/ mtha' dang rab dpon 'jug ba dang// ci yang med dang skye med nas// nyebar zhibe'aba' dag dang/ 'di la
sogasaba'i reg ba rnams // rgyu dang rkyenan 'dus pa las// 'byung ba nyid du rtogs bsan// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des nimig gi sngonamatha' ya// brjod pa rangabazhin bstan
med pa// rab tu rtogs par gyur pas na// de la zhen pa ci yang med// des ni mig gi phyi mtha' yi// brjod ba rang bzhin bstan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyurapasan// dal
zhen paci yang med// des na mig ki skya mtha' dang// mtha' dang rab dben 'jug pa dang// ci yang med dngaskya mdanas// nye bar zhi ba'i bar dag dang/ 'do la sogasapa'i
brjod pa rnams / rang bzhin gyisanibastan med par// rab tu rtogs par gyur pasan// de la zhen pa ci lang cheng// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// lul drug dang ni 'byung
chen ba'i// 'jig rten skye ba'imang gi ba/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// des ni 'dod chags sasargyas ma// rang bzhin dbu ramadaman pa ni// rab tu rtogs pa
gyur pasan// 'dod chags lan zhin ba med/ sas rgyas laman thams cad kun// nyon mongs las btsal bar bya/ rang bshen dbyar mad 'bashesan/ kun 'dzin sgor
ni zhugs pa yi// 'dod chags kun 'dzin yin pa dang// kun 'dzin 'dod chags yin ston cing// rang bzhin dbye med rab shesan/ kun 'dzin sgo naslob ba yin//
dbazhin 'dod chagasang mchod nga// de nasangs rgyas mchod pa yin/ sangs rgyas la nimachod pa'i phyig/ kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// des na zhe sdang sangs
rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyer med yin par ni// rab tu rtogs par gyur pasan// zhe sdang la ni zhen pamad// zhesdang kun 'dzin yin pa dang/ kun 'dzin zhe sdang yin ston cing//
rang bzhin dburamed rob shesan// kun 'dzin sgo ni slob pa yin// de bzhin zhe sdang gad mchod pa// de ni sangs rgyasamachod pa yin// sangs rgyas lanamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin
sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// des na gti mug sangs rgyas lam// rang bzhin dbyin da lan bani// rab tu rtogs par gyur bas na// gti mug lanazhin pa med// gal te ga titshug
nyid kyimatha'// yad dkajibazhin rtogs gyur na// des nasangasargyus lam sgrub pas/ kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// gti mug kun 'dzin yin pa dang/ kun 'dzin gti
mug yin ston cing// rang bzhin dbye med 'bazhes nas// kun 'dzin sgon slobe pa yin// de bzhin gti mug gdamachod pa/ de bsangs rgyasamachod ba yin// sangs rgyas la nimachod
pa'i phyir// kun 'dzinaskon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtimug gangamachod pa'i/ de ni chos la mchod pa yin// chos lamachodapa byas pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzanasmon rdzogs par
'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gamachod ba// de ni dge 'dun mchod pa yin// dge 'dun la ni mchod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgo rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gdamached
de ni tshul khrims mchod pa yin// tshul khrims lanam chod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa yin/
brtson 'grus la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs bar 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gangamachod pa/ bsngags pa brjod cing mchod pa yin/ bsngags pa brjod cing mchodapa'i
phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// sangs rgyas chos lamachod pa yin// sangs rgyas chos lamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo
ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ chos nyid la ni mchod pa yin// chos nyid la ni mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzinu0f00na rdzogs par byed// de bzhin gti
mug gangamachod pa// de bzhin nyid lamachod pa yin// de bzhin nyid la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtiyug kang mchodapa// sku bamed la
mchod pa yin// skye ba med lamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo nardzogs bar 'gyur// de bzhin gtiyug gang mchod pa// 'gag pa med la mchod pa yin// 'gag pa med la mchod
ba'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogasapar 'gyur// de bzhin gtilug gang mchod pa// zag pa med la mchod pa yin// zag pa med la mchod pa'i phyir//
[】 ]kun 'dzin sgro ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gangamachod pa// ci la dmed la mchod pa yin// ci yang med la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo'i rdzogs par 'gyur//
de bzhin gtiug gang mchod pa dpag tu med la mchod pa yin// dpag tu med lamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgron rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin ga dumug gang mchod pa//
srid pa gsum lamachod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod ba/ )rab dben la mchod ba yin/ rab dben la ni mchod pa'i phyir//
kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtimug gangamachod pa// 'khor bar 'jug lamachod ba yin// 'khor bar 'jug lamachod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogasab
'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod bu// 'jug pa mdu lamachod pa lan// 'jug pa myud lamachod pa'aphyir// kun 'dzin skyon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhini gti mug
gang mchod pa// yod pa minalagacod pa yin// bod khamin pa mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgor rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhinagachug gang mchod pa)/ byungab med la/
mchod ba yin// byung ba med lamachod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgron rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtimug gangamachod ba// nye bar zhi la mchod pa yin// zhebar zhi la mchod pa'i
phyir// kun 'dzin sgos rdzogs bar 'gyur// de bzhin gtiyugagangamachod pa// 'ong ba med lamachod pa yin// 'ong bamed lamachod pa'i phyir/ dkun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs
par 'gyur de bzhin gde mug gangamachodab// 'gro bamed lamachod pa yin// 'gro bamad lamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gti
mug gang mchod pa// 'dus byas lan mchod pa yani// 'dus byas khanumached pa'i phyi'i/ kun 'dzin sgon rdzogos par 'gyur// de bzhin ga ti mug gang mchod pa// sdug
bsngal lasogs mchod pa yin// sdug bsngal lasogs mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod nga// sdug bsngal shes
la mchod pa yin// sdug bsngal shes lo mchod pa'i phyir/ kun 'dzin sgo nardzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa// kun 'byung shes la mchod pa yin// kun
'byung shes la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yug gang mchod pa// 'gog pashes la mchod pa yin// 'gog pa shes la mchod pa'i phyir//
kun 'dzin rgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gti mug gang mchod pa/ lamashes la ni se nod pa yin// lam zhes lanamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin
sgo ni rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtimug gang mchod pa// chos shes la ni mchod ba yin// chos shes lan mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin skon rdzogs par 'gyur// de
bzhin gti mug gad mchod pa// rjes lashes lamachod pa yin// rjes la shes la mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin so na rdzogs bar 'gyur// debazhanagadimug gangamachod pa//
skyo ma da ye shes mchod pa yin// skye med ye shesamachod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgron rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin gtimug gang mchod pa// zad pa'i ye shes mchod pa yin//
zad pa'i shes mchod pa'i phyir// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dag spong ba dang/ dran pa nyer gzhag rdzu 'phrul rkang// dbang po lta dang stobs lnga dang//
byang chub yan lag bdun bo dang// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dag ngang// zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa// chosani rnam pa dgu po mas/ thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ ragisakyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po la gnas nas/ gong du ji skad bstan pa'i
gzungs mngon par 'grub par 'dod pas/ gang zag rnam pa brgyad cu yongasasu spang bar bya'o// rnam pa brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta/ pha bsad pa dang/ ma bsad pa dang/ dku
bcom pa bsad ba dang/ gnod sems kyisade bzhin gshegs pa'isku mtshal phyung ba dang/ dge 'dun 'thun pa bshig pa dang/ rkun bur rab tu byung ba dang/ dbang po ma tshang ba dang//
dbang bo gnyis dang ldan pa dang/ log par lta ba dang/ log par sems pa dad log par smra ba dang/ log pa'i las can dang log pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ leg par brtson pa dang//
log pa'i dran pa run dang/ log pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa dang/ gnas mi shes pa dang/ dus mi shes pa dang/ tshod mi shes pa dang lam mishes pa dang/ tshangameshas pa//
dang/ rnabadag dang gzhan mi shes pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ bslab pa'i gnas rnams la gus pa med pa dang/ bag yod pa dang spyod yul khyad
bar du 'phags pa dag la btsun pa'am 'dzin pa dang/ chos bshesapa dang/ 'dul bami shes pa dang/ bslab pa'i gnasami shes pa dang/ khan ma tho ba lcib dad yang ba mishes pa dang/
tshul khrims nyams ba dang ral ba mi shes pa dang/ gzhan yang spyod pa shin tu phra ba dang rags pam shes pa dang/ las ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung bami shis pa dang dngosapo dman pa rnams
@#/ (ming shes pa dang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi theg pa sgrub bar bskul
'dang/ bla na med pa'i lam yang dag pa la skyo zhing spong bar byed pa dang/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang/ lta ba nyams pa dad spyod lam nyams pa dang/ lam ma yin paspyod pa dang/ bdag/
yod par smra ba dang/ sems can yod par smra ba dad/ srog yod par smra ba dang [ ]gang zag yod par smra ba dang/ bsamapa shin tu dman zhing 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdad dang/ g.yugaskyedapar
byed pa dang chad par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ stong zhing rgyu ni da bar lta ba dang/ yod ba ma mikhyong ba dang/ mad pam mthong ba dang/ las mi mthong ba dang/ brtson 'grus ni grong
ba dang/ las mngashis pa dang/ 'asakyi rgyu mi shes ba dang/ rnam par smin pa mi shes pa dang rnam par smin pa'irgyu ma shes pa dang/ dbang po rnams ma shes pa dang/ dbang bo rnams kyi rgyu mi
shasapa dang/ khamasam shesapa dang/ khamos kyi rgyum shes pa dang/ rnam par grolayam shes pa dang/ rnam par grolaba'irgyu ma shesapa dang/ lam mi shes pa dad/ lam kyi rgya mashes pa dang nyes ming

ba mashes pa dang/ nyon mongs ba'i rgyun shes ba dang/ gtong ba mishes pa dang/ gtodaba'i rgyun shes pa dang/ sngon gyimatha' dang phyi ma 'amatha'ami shes pa dang/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'

0 yi rgyu meshes ba dang/ skyashi ma shes pa dang/ stsa 'i rgyu mi shes pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa mi shes pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu mi shes pa dang/ zad pa dang zad pa ma yin pa mi shes pa
dang/ yod ba dang yod bam yin pami shes pa dang mtha'adang mtha' ma yin pam shes pa dang/ dbenapadang dben pa mayin pa mi shes ba dang/ 'jug pa dang 'jug pa ma yin mi shes pa dang/ do
bo 'di dang de de nyid ma yin pa mi shes pa dang/ skye ba dang skye ba ma yin mi shes ba dang/ 'gog pa dang 'gog pa ma yin pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ gzhon nu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu gang la la zhage gong du ji skad bstan pa'i gzungs mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pas chosam yan paspyod pa'i gang zag brgyad cu po 'di dag yongasasusdang bar bya'o// de nas bcos
ldan 'das kyis ya nga tshigasasu bcad de bka' stsal ba/ gang zhig mig gi mtha' dang/ zad mtha' dgan mi rtogs pa// de nikun 'dzin la rmongs pas// mkhas pas yongasasu spang bar bya/
gang zhugamig la bdag med dang// sams canamad par rtogs gyur pa// den kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bstan par bya// gang zhigamig nicu zad dang// yi ge spangs
ba rtogs gyur pa// den kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs su bstan par bya// gang zhigamigan dben pa dang// gnas pa med par rtogs gyurapa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas
bsarnamakhas pas yongs subastan par bya// gang zhig mig gi ring bzhin nyidi// gnas pamed par rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas yongs
subastan bar bya// gang zhig mig la 'jugamed dang// gzugs latshan nyid med rtogs pa// den kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhasapas yo sasu bstan par bya// gangazhagamig la skya med
wA dang ! rang bzhin zhi bar rtogs gyur pa// den kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ mkhas pas yosasubasten par gru/ gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin gyis// mag gamtshan nyid spangs pas na//
sa ngas rgyas rnams kyi bsngags pa dang// bstan du med par rtogs gyur pa// de ni kun 'dzin la gnas pas/ mkhas pas yongs su bstan par bya// gang zhig mig gi rang bzhin gyis// mig gimatsan
nyidispungs bsan// su yang sems shing 'dzinabadang// bshad du med par rtogs gyur pa// den kun 'dzin la gnas pas// mkhas pas losasu bstan par b// de bzhin gzungasakyi ngo bo nyid// ya ki brjod
bu ma yin pas// phyogasakyang yodapa ma yin la/ sems kyis kyang phyin mi 'gyur// chos de la ni dga' bamed// zhe sdang la yang gnas pa min// rgyal bzhin dum g.yo bas// rjod bar khyod kyang dmigs su
yod da kun 'adzin yang dag yod ma yin// bdag kyang yod pa ma yin te// gal te bdag gi rang bzhin stong// kun 'dzin lag ni dma'agyur// kun 'dzin rang bzhin stong yinan// byis pas yod par rab tu

brtags// yad dgam yin brtags pas na/ ma zosapar yang m ngan spyad// gang zhig 'dod dang kun 'dzin dag/ stong pa nyid du rnam rtog pa// rtog pa gnyis po de dag kyang/ don h+pharan gang yang dmigs mi 'gyur/

gal te stong nyidestong rtogasan// kun 'dzin dag kyang yodami 'gyur// byang chub yan lagapar dag dang// ting 'dzin dag kyang ston pa yin// gang zhig kun 'dzin stong nyid dang// ting 'dzin dag gi bar dag kyang// rab tu
rtogs par gyur na ni// mag kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/ gang zhig mig na yod pa'amathal// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar n yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig
mig ni sgruba'i ma thag/ gang dag ji bzhin rab rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo gang yin pa/ mahA nayongasasu rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig lam phran ma rnams // yang dag jibazhinarab rtogs// kun 'dzin sgo

degang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs bar byed// gang zhig mig rib dpon pa// yang dag jibazhin rang rtogasan// kun 'dzinagonagang yin pa// mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhagamigako'ajug ba
ngag yang dag jibazhin rab rtogasan// kun 'dzin sgo nigang yin pa// mthunan yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mgo ni yod min pa// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogasan// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/khar
ni yongs su rdzogs bar byed// gang zhigamigan tir zhib// yang dag ji bzhin rab rtogasan/ kun 'dzin sgon gang yin pa/ mthar ni yos su rdzogs par byed// gang zhigamigani 'gyur ba gi/ zad mtha'
yang dag bzhin rtogasan// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa/ mthar ni yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// skyamatha' yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni
gang yin pa// mtha'an yongasasu rdzogs b.rabyed// gang zhig mgagi 'gyur ba yi// mtha' ni yod dgabazhin rtogasan// kun 'dzin sgron gang yin pa// mtha2nayongasasu rdzogs par byed// gang zhig ma ga gi
'gyur ba gi/ rab dben yang dag bzhin rtogasan/ kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yosasu rdzogs par byed// gang zhigamig gi 'gyur ba yi// 'jug pa yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin/
sgo nasegang yin pa// mthar na yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// med pa yang dag bzhin rtogs na// kun 'dzin sgo ni gang yin pa// mthar n yongs su rdzogs par byed// gang zhig

mig gi 'gyur ba dag/ skye med yang dag bzhin rtogasan/ kun 'dzin sgon gang yin ba// mtha'ani yongs su rdzogasang du byed// gang zhig mig gi 'gyur ba yi// taMr zhi la de dag bzhin rtogs// kun 'dzin sgo

ni gang yin pa// mthar ni yongasasurdzogs par byed// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi/ 'jig rtenaskya ba'aming gi la// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang zhig mgagi

sngonamatha' la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid mod// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzan sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi zadamatha' la// 'gyur dang tha dadamtshan nyidamed// len dang rnam

rtog med gyur ba// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi snyamatha' la// 'gyur dang tha dad katshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzinaso la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi/

mtha' dag la// 'gyur dad tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog mdagyur pa// kun 'dzinao la gnas ba yin// gang zhig mig gi nyer zhi la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med
gyur ba// kun 'dzin sko la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig gi 'jug pa la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur/ kun 'dzin skyo laganas pa yin// gang zhigam ga gamed pa la//
gyur dang tha dadamtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur ba// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin/ gang zhig mig gistsamad la// 'gyur dang tha dad mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur ba//
kun 'dzin sgo laganasapa yin// gang zhigamigaganyer zhi la/'gyur dang thu dang mtshan nyid med// len dang rnam rtog med gyur ga/ kun 'adzinasgo laganas ba yin// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul
drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// 'dod sdang gtimug nga rgyalatshe// phrag dog g.yoskyasarasna dang// nyes migs drim zug rngu dang//
chubo dkar nag las rnams dang// skyabamed dang 'gagamed dang// 'gro bamad dang 'ongomid dang// mi g.yo tha dadami 'gyur dang// byas minaspyod pam yin dang// snang ba na mun ba ma ya na dang/ 'jug/
min chu bo spangs pa dang// zag pa med dang gnasamad dang// 'gro min ma 'grom yin dang// yagi ma yin dmigasamin dang/ dbyung ba ma yin 'jugamin dang// yang dgam
yin ma rtogasogs// sgo ni drug cu rtsa gnyis rnams // so so'i don dang cirigs par// thamasacad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gang zhigamagagisngonamatha' yi// rab dang mtha'ama'i bar shes shing//
len dang rnam rtog med gyur ba// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhigamag gi 'damatha' yi// rab dang mtha'ama'ibar shes shing// len dang rnam rtogamedagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas
pa yin// gang zhig migagastsamany+dza' ya/ rab dang mtha'ama'i bar shes shing// len dang rnamartogamedagyur pa// kun 'dzinasgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhigamig gamatha' dag gi/ rab dngamatha'ama'i bar

shing len dang rnam rtogamed gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig/reb benapa'i// rab dngamatha'ama'abar shes shing// len dang rnam rtogamed gyur pa// kun 'dzinasgo la gnas pa yin// gang
zhigamig gi 'jugapa yi// rab dngamatha'ama' babs shing// len dang rnamartogamadagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnasapa yin// gang zhigamagon med ba yi// rab dngamatha'ama'i bshes shing// len dang rnam

rtog med gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo la gnas pa yin// gang zhig mig mi skye yi// rab dngamatha'ama'ibar shes shing// lenadang rnamartogamed gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo laganas pa yin// gang zhig mgani ra zhi ba'ajab

dngam gra'ama'abar shes shing// len dang rnamartog med gyur pa// kun 'dzi sgo la gnas pa yin// rna ba sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rtenaskyakha'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin

sbyar bar bya// sa la gyur bamed pa yin// len dang rnam rtogamed b.ran// diltaragang zhig rtogs gyur pa/ dkun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed// sanam skyi 'du shes shing// len dang rnam rtog med par ni// de ltar
gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par byed// san 'gagamed bdushes shing// len dang rnamartogamed par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgonordzogs par byed// sa la 'jug

par 'du shes shang// len dang rnam rtog med par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo nardzogs par byed// sa la nges 'byung 'du shes shing// len dang rnam rtogamed par ni// de ltar gang
zhig rtog gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs bar byed// sa ba son med 'du shes shing// len dang rnam rtog med par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur ba// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par byed// sa la gnas
med 'du shesashing// 'gro ba mad dang 'ong med dang// mtha' med dang na zadamed dang// mtshungs par ldan dngamatshungasaman ldan// ming dang yige'ibartags braladang// sasor brtags dang 'jug pa

dang [：]gnyen pom mthun phyogasamed dang// brjod du med cing bstan med dang// rab dban gnas pamed pa dang// dran pa nyer gzhag yang dag spong// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs// byang chub yan lag mi
'jigs lam// de ltar sa yi chos rnams la// len dang rnam rtog medabar ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par byed// gal te bdag la'ajugamadangs//

len dang rnam rtog med par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo ni rdzogs par byed// gal te bdag la 'byungamed pas// len dang rnam rtogamad pa ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa// kun

'dzin sgo'i rdzogs bar byed// gal te bdag lamtshanamed pas// len dang rnam rtogamad b.rani// de ltaragang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgron rdzogs par byed// gal te bdag lasmonamad pas// len dang rnam

rtog med par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogasapar byed// gal te bdag lags med pas// len dang rnam rtog med par n// de ltar gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogs par
byed/gal te bdag lastsamed pas// lenadang rnam rtog med par ni// de ltar gang zhig rtogs gyur pa// kun 'dzin sgo nardzogs bar byed//gal te bdag la 'gagamed pas// len dang martogamed par ni// de ltar
gang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogasapar byed// gal te bdag la yigamed pas// lan dang rnam rtog med par/ ]/de ltaragang zhig rtogasagyur pa// kun 'dzinasgon rdzogs par byed// gal te bdag

ni yig bral las// len dang rnam rtogamed par ni// de ltaragang zhig rtogasagyur ba// kun 'dzin sgon rdzogasaparabyed// mig gi sngonadang phyimatha' dag/ rtag chad dganaMspangs pa dang// rgyu rkyen rang bzhin ston

ba par ni// 'dren bsat+tabasakyis bstan rig byos// gal tachos ni ston pa'i tshe// mig gimtshan nyid rtog byedan// den mi bden rtags yin pas// ya da dgachos kastan zhes mi bya// gal te chos ni sams pa'i
tshe rnamagag mtshan nyid rtogabyedan// den mi bden rtog yin pas// chos sems pa zhes mi bya'o// galatachos sgom pa'amaM/ migagi mtshan nyid rtogabyed na// de nas bden rtog yin pas/ dngosasgom pa zhes
mi bya'o// gang zhigamag gi stong nyid rtogs// byang chub gzhol bar ma byed na// sangs rgyas gangazag de dag la// rtag tu mngon sumachosan+tonamadzad// gal te migamartogs na// gzugs kyang rtogs
param 'gyur la// gal te migan rtogs gyuran// gzugs kyang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur// gal te mig ni rtogs gyur na// gzugs kyang rab tu rtogasagyur la// gal te gzugs ni rtogasakyu ran// yig

kyang rab tu rtogasapar gyur// rnabastsalce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rtenaskye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gal te chosani ston pa'i tshe// rgyu yatshan nyid rtog

byed na// de ni mi bden rtog yin pas// chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o// gal te chosan ston pa'i tshe// rab dbon mtshan nyid rtogabyed na// de nimabadan rtog yin pas// chosaston pa zhes mabya'o// gal techesan ston
pa'i tshe// lamagyi mtshan nyid rtog byed na// de ni mi bden rtog yin pas// chosaston pa zhes mabya'o// gal te chos ston pa'atshe// stong pa'amtshan nyid rtog byed na// den mi bden rtog yin pas//
chos ston pa zhesam bya'o// gal te chosan ston pa'i tshe// bsags pa dag tu rtog byedan// denami bden rtog yin pas// chos ston pa zhes mi bya'o// gal
te chosan ston pa'i tshe// rdzas kyi dngos po rtogasabyed// de ni mi bden rtog yin pas// chosaston ba zhesami byago/ gal te chosan stonapa'atsho// mig gi 'dzin par rtog byedan// de
ni mi bden rtog yin pas// chosaston pa zhesamabya'o// miganashes par 'gyur na// 'dod chags dgun skyobar 'gyur// gal te migan shes gyuran// 'dod chags dganastsami 'gyur
rnab sna lce lus dang yid// yul drug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skyo ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// gal te chosanibastan pa'i// khams ni snatshogs rtog
byedan// de ni mi bden rtogs yin pas// chosaston pa zhesam bya'o// yi dam dganamanyems shing/ ngo bo nyidi stong rtogs bdang// ting 'dzin sgo rnams thob gyur ba// des ni chos
legs ston par 'gyur// yi dam dragani mi nyams shing// mag la rtogs pa sbas pa ni/ ma rtog med par gyur ba'i phyir// desar chos legasaston par 'gyur// miganyid stong
par ma shesan// mag gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs// 'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir// ngosani chos rnams bstanamabya// gal te mig nyidastongashesan/ mig gi reng bzhani
shes par 'gyur// 'di ltararab tushes pa'i phyir// desani chos 'babastan par bya// mig nyid stong par ma shesan// tshig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs// 'di ltar khong du ma blud/
phyi/ des na chos rnams bstan mi bya// gal tamiganyid stongashesan// tshig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur// 'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir// des ni chos rab bstan par bya//
miganyid stong par ma shes na/ yi ge'i rang bzhin ngag la rmongs// 'di ltar khong du ma chud phyir// des ni chos rnams bstan mi bya// gal te miganyid stong shes na// sa ga'aring
pazhin shes par 'gyur// 'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyi'o// des na tshes rab bstan par bya// mgong stong par ma shes na// mig gi rang bzhin dag la rmongs// 'di ltar khong
du mchud phyir// des na chos rnams bstan mi bya// gal te miganyid stong shes rta// mig gi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur// 'di ltar rab tu shes pa'i phyir/ des nAtshesab bstan pa//
bya8 rnamagatade stong par mnyes na// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dag larmongs// 'di ltar khong du mchud phyir// desani chos rnamasabastan mub gal te migang stodashisan/ dgazugs
kyi rang bzhin shes par 'gyur// 'di ltarab shesapa'iphyir/ des na chos rab bstan par bya// mig ted stong par ma shesan// 'jig rten mtshan gnas rtog byed pas// rjesasu 'thun pa'i
nar ni// semasacanamasazhi ba dul nus// mgagi yodamadamartogs par/ 'khor gyinang du chos stonapa/ 'danernyed lagadubasan// thams cad yid ches len
byed// mag gi yod med rtogasagyur na// 'khor gyinang du chosastonapas// desanamangonazhan med bsan// thams cad yid tshos len par byed// miganistong par ma rtogasapar// chos kyi stan la
'duganasan// dab mang dgags 'babastan kyang// thamasaM cad yid chesalen ma byed// gal temaganyidastod shasan// chos kyi stan la 'duganasan// dpa rnamasakyisan ston byedan// thams
( cad yid chesalen par byed// rnabasna lce lus dang yid// yuladrug dang ni 'byung chen bzhi// 'jig rten skye ba'i ming gi bar// thams cad de bzhin sbyar bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ zla 'od gzhonanur gyur pa dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa lamangonapar bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stongaphrag brgya pa las/ 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i le'u ste 'dus
ba bcu gcig pa rdzogasaso/// blokastong lnga brgya pa/ bamapolnga'o//
